author: MR. GEE MANN
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to use holds a charge.
body: These are easy to use, good price and easy to pair with phone.  Fits comfortably in ear, holds a charge for a long time, and easy to manage all around.

author: TDodge
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsInconsistency is annoying
body: Really happy with these Tozo T10 Bluetooth earbuds, so much so that these are my 3rd and 4th set, respectively.  That said, I am unhappy that Tozo changed the design on these by moving the part that inserts into your ear from the center of the earbud to the front, more similar to their model A10 headphones, but kept the model number the same despite the change!  They also changed the size of the charging case.  So now I have 2 pairs each of 2 different style headphones with the same model number.  Bad form for any manufacturer.  Renaming the new design with it's own model number should have been obvious and straighforward.

author: Jimmy
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAmazing for a long time till now
body: I have had this for a while now (I think I have a older version than this that they changed) and never had a issue extremely long charge while using and stand by (I stopped using them for eight-ten months and they still had charge) but lately the sound just randomly cut. It doesn’t pause or lowers the sound to zero just stops. This is the first issue I’ve had but generally love these always reliable just hope for some help.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsGood, but need a lot of work….
body: I’ve owned these for a year… the quality of the sound is decent. No major complaints. They’re cheap but they don’t sound bad. The biggest problem is connectivity/pairing. Every single time I take them out of the case to use them, they refuse to pair to my iPhone and my iPhone requires me to forget the device and re-pair them. It’s a massive pain, so much so that I’m just going to invest in AirPods now. The battery life is really good. I only charge the case once a week with everyday use. They’re not very comfortable, to me, but it’s easy to get over that part.

author: Kindle Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product
body: Great bargain better than my more expensive sets. The app is great for fine tuning you listening

author: Sidney Clemons
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsOne earbud sounds lower than the other
body: I like the sound quality but every time I go to use the earbuds, one earbud is lower than the other. I thought there was some wax buildup so I cleaned them but same issue. But then the volume would randomly go back to normal so it was just the earbuds themselves. I've tried turning them off and on again but that didn't work either. These things are just a headache. 😕

author: Tre
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsThese> galaxy buds garbage
body: Bought these to replace my galaxy buds that out of the blue stopped working(technically they still work but the right one has a loud beeping noise whenever it’s on so you can only use the left). Straight out of the box these are head and feet shoulders better. Better sound, they actually stay in your ear, lighter and more comfortable, comes with different foam pieces, and it’s a quarter of the price. I had my buds about 9 months before I started having issues so if I can match or exceed that for $100 less I’ll be a happy camper.

author: Miriam
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSo good I've bought three times!
body: I love love love these things. Waterproof, lightweight, and sound great! I keep losing them, but I rebuy them each time lol. I do think the build quality has gone down slightly, but they are still great for the price.

author: KLB
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBring back the classic version
body: The old T10 were so much better than the current version. The new set are uncomfortable and have an annoying beep to tell you when it's on/connect to Bluetooth.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsvery convenient
body: I like these headphones over the previous models. They have an app where you can adjust the audio settings and even a community where people have created their own unique settings. I also like that it came with an adjustable strap. Pairing it to my Bluetooth was easy and they are pretty comfortable to wear. however, the voice cancellation doesn't work when I use these headphones and it picks up a lot of background noise.

author: C. Richardson
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent Keychain Earbuds!
body: I've had these earbuds for over two years now, and they're still going strong. Before this, I owned a much more expensive pair of Apple earbuds, but I actually prefer these. They sound just as good, fit more securely in my ears, and offer one feature I absolutely love: a built-in loop that lets me attach them to my keychain—no extra case needed. I often find myself wanting earbuds on the fly, and having them always on my keychain is incredibly convenient. I wish more earbuds came with a simple built-in keychain loop like these do. With most other brands, you have to buy an extra accessory for that, and it's never as sleek or practical as this built-in design.

author: Nicole A.
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsDisappointed.
body: Pretty disappointed. Had for 1 year, I don’t use them frequently - only the right side works the last few months and the battery doesn’t hold. I bought a set for myself and my daughter - same problem with both. Would not recommend, would not buy again.

author: Anthony
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsTozo is good
body: The sound is like a good surround sound system 🙂😁 that beats your ears up, 💪💯 foreal 😆😭 Great job 👍 I like these better than the other ones I had before.. thanks tozo!!

author: Estevan Aragon
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound for music/not so good for calls. Durable ASF
body: I've been running these ear buds for 4 years now. The sound quality is great, bass hits and highs are clean and crisp. I haven't had any issues with them aside from the magnet falling out of the lid. They still work most of the time but I am having connection issues with one bud. A few taps and it works again. For the price you can't beat them. I blast them loud ASF at work and for the most part no one else can hear them and they block out noise good enough. I would buy them again but am going to try a newer model from tozo. Overall great buy, cheap enough to lose and not feel bad. I have had complaints about taking calls, they pick up background noises and echo. For music which is my priority they're great.

author: Ron

author: Jose Carranza

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsTOZO is always a great choice.
body: I've always loved my tozo headphones in the past. I rely on them for keeping current with my favorite podcasts while I'm doing various work activities. So when I couldn't find my headphones for some reason or another, I immediately went to reorder a new pair. Love the quick delivery and cannot beat the price. Will report on quality later.

body: These buds are a bit more hefty so they fit snugly when placed as directed. Sound is nice and clear, too.

author: RED
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsReally awesome earbuds!
body: Outstanding!!! I have tried a lot of earbuds and these for the price are most excellent! I like them so much that I ordered another pair the same day. Comfortable, light weight plenty of different sized inserts. No complaints!!!

author: Allison T
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExceptional quality and service
body: I wanted to take a moment to share my outstanding experience with both TOZO T10 earbuds and the exceptional customer service provided by the TOZO support team. These earbuds are truly impressive, offering extraordinary sound and bass quality that exceeded my expectations. I used them daily and was consistently impressed by their performance and comfort. Unfortunately, after around a year, I experienced an issue with the original pair where the left earbud began to glitch and eventually stopped producing sound. When I reached out to TOZO’s customer support, I was fortunate to be assisted by Winona, who provided phenomenal service. They responded promptly and professionally, guiding me through a few troubleshooting steps to resolve the issue. When those didn’t work, they immediately offered to send me a replacement pair at no cost. I received the replacement earbuds quickly, and I must say, they sound just as incredible as the first time I tried them. I genuinely felt like I was experiencing the product anew. TOZO’s commitment to product quality and customer satisfaction is truly commendable, and I couldn’t be more pleased. Highly recommended, for both the product and the service behind it.

author: ZL25
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsFantastic While It Lasted — Great Value Over 3 Years
body: We had the previous version of the TOZO T10, and it was awesome while it lasted. The sound quality was rich with deep bass, the Bluetooth connection was stable, and the battery life—with the charging case—easily got us through days of use. The IPX8 waterproofing was perfect for workouts and rainy days, and the wireless charging case added extra convenience. It lasted us about 3 solid years before showing signs of wear. While not the longest lifespan, it delivered excellent performance and value the entire time. Based on our experience, we’d definitely consider getting this upgraded 2025 version.

author: Dalia Carranza
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsThey used to be good...until the latest version
body: Not sure what happened between the previous version and this current one but it's been one flaw after another which is a huge bummer as I've enjoyed this brand/headphones and have even bought them for a friend before. My last pair was my favorite but my mom like them so much, I had to give them to her. I thought it would be a quick and easy fix of ordering an exact same pair but NOPE. Whatever "updates" this version has, have been annoying. The headphones will randomly connect to the phone while in the middle of a phone call even though BOTH headphones have been placed in their case previously in the day and certainly before the phone call. The previous pair would easily disconnect as soon as they would be placed in the case, allowing a smooth and easy transition between Bluetooth devices or just phone volume alone. The previous version, would also have a verbal message for items such as when the headphones would be connected and then synced. This current one is a series of random beeps and noises that there's no differentiating what they mean. I just wish I could have my last pair back at this point 😭

author: MG
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsTremendous bang for the buck. Great sound quality.
body: I consider myself somewhat of an audiophile, and in my opinion, the TOZO 10 earbuds sound better than Apple's ear pods. (Disclosure: I listen to music through the Equalizer app available through the App store.) Bass sounds pretty good, treble isn't too tinny, they fit reasonably well, and overall, the sound reproduction is pretty awesome in its clarity. The one downside is that their bulkiness makes them uncomfortable to sleep with if you're a side sleeper, so I'm trying to find a lower profile pair for sleeping. But seriously, for $20, the sound quality on these is spectacular, and when I'm using earbuds anytime other than for sleeping, these are my choice.

author: Bridgette77
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWow! These are amazing, and I am picky!
body: OK, I will start off by saying, I am not necessarily an audio file, but I know how I want my music to sound, and I like them to have plenty of base, and decent volume! I also need a good pair of earbuds that will stay in my ears, Since I do workouts! Now, let me tell you! These are amazing, and I couldn’t ask for better earbuds! I have a pair of Sony WXM fives over the ear, headphones, They were very disappointing! I have tried many other pairs of headphones from Sony‘s, Bose, JBL, J lab, soundcore, and a whole bunch others. While some of them are good, they are lacking in something. This is what was frustrating me. They either didn’t have enough base, volume, or they sounded muddy, or squashed. Some of the apps that came with some of them also did not work very well. I have a whole drawer full of headphones that were just not quite right for me. Then I decided on a whim to try these, and I wasn’t disappointed! These have amazing base, but they are also well balanced, and the base does not distort or drowned out the instruments or voices at all! Plus, you have a plethora of EQ presets to choose from, or you can adjust your own! You can also choose from others that other people have created inside the app. That is what I’ve done. I found a perfect equalizer setting that is perfect for my needs! Plenty of base, crisp and clear vocals, instruments are Perfectly spaced out where they should be, and you can even hear the high hats, without them being buried or too sharp.  The app is very easy to use as well. I am visually impaired, and I have no trouble navigating it. The only trouble I had was the profile set up, but that’s it. Once I got past it, everything was simple. And finally oh finally! I found a pair of earbuds that stay in my ears even on a run. Even when I am doing. Heavy resistance training, they still stay in. Even when I am upside down they stay in. They don’t come out. They come with a few sizes of eartips, so you should find ones that will keep them in your ears and block noise. They’re also good at blocking noise. Start with the largest tips and work your way down.  I’m actually using one extra large size in one ear, and one large size in the other. I have two different ear shapes. That’s what I did. The fact that these are also waterproof is great for me! I sweat a lot when I do workouts, so this is awesome. I’ve never been brave enough like others in the reviews have done, to take them in the shower yet. Maybe I’ll try it once I get my second pair today. Also, one more thing, the touch controls are very easy to navigate. I have not had any misses yet. They’re also very clear on calls as well from what I’ve been told. So these are perfect! I am very glad I bought two of them! I am very happy with these, and you won’t regret the purchase! Just do it! The price is right, why not? Get a couple pairs!

author: AJ
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDecent for the Price
body: Bought these to replace headphones that got destroyed in the washer. If they're in your ears the waterproofing is fine but I took a headphone out of one ear, it got water in the part that goes in your ear and it went out. After it had plenty of time to dry it was okay but shouldn't have done that to begin with. Other IPX8 headphones I've worn swimming with no issue but these need to remain unsubmerged. Sound quality is good, the connections a little spotty here and there when I first turn them on but not too bad and it improved quickly. They're decent headphones for the price. My main issue is the touch features are way too sensitive, my hair brushing across pauses my music and when I put on a hat it cranked the volume up. Water hitting either headphone also sets off the touch features.

title: 4.0 out of 5 starsNot the same as the old t10s
body: They redesigned the t10s or I got the wrong ones. The ear piece used to be more comfortable than this one. I have 3 pairs of T10s because I loved them so much and wanted a pair for every place I use them, in my purse for on the go, one downstairs, one upstairs and then I decided to buy a 4th pair for my school work and after just one hour wearing them, my ears are sore. Please go back to the old design!

author: AC2005
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat earbuds!
body: I got these for my teenage daughter, she loves the color and the quality, they last for hours and connect easily.

author: Ray Lieu
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsgreat product, better support
body: headphones work great and tozo support is great. after 5 months, i had a problem w my right earbud. it wouldn't connect to anything and would not reset. contacted support and they shipped me a new earbud after running some troubleshooting. fantastic support and great product!

author: The point
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNot used anymore
body: Was good

author: nes4bit
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAnother great sounding wireless earbuds from Tozo!
body: First of all, I'm extremely pleased with the great sound quality coming out from these T6 earbuds.  The T6 earbuds fits comfortably in the ear and no fear of it falling out during the exercising activities.  To fully appreciate this T6 earbuds, make sure you download their Tozo App, where you can customized your listening preference. The charging case does have an LED power indicator, but it doesn't tell you how much battery power is left in the earbuds.  Using the Tozo app, you'll know exactly the percentage of battery power left in each of the earbuds. Overall, I'm very happy with the purchase of this Tozo T6 Wireless earbuds.

author: Eilish Artrip
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDecent, but the old style was better.
body: I bought a pair of these a couple years ago. Worked great, sat in the ear well, no issues connecting. Eventually they just got worn out from a lot of use, so I bought a new pair. Decided to get the blue because, ya know, why not? Y’all, these ain’t it. For starters, they won’t connect half the time when I take them out of the case. I have to constantly put them back in, take them back out, repeat for usually at least a minute to finally get them to turn on and connect. Also, these have a strange twist/curve shape to them that the old pair didn’t have. If it’s supposed to make them fit better in the ear, it wildly missed the mark. These constantly try to fall out of my ears; never had that issue with the old ones. And if I don’t position them juuust right, I actually get no sound out of them at all. The sound quality is good, at least. And the blue is pretty. But ergonomics and connection wise, these fall short.

author: Kyle Weiss
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsTozo T6 gets a 4.4/5, Read Below
body: Tozo's T6 model earbuds are as basic as they get, and for the price, they get the job done Owning Tozo's older NC2, NC9 and Crystal Pods, I prefer an ANC earbud experience, but that may not be for everyone The T6 model has fantastic battery life, great sound and a comfortable stemless fit; I would prefer a slightly smaller case and better battery indicators, but at this price it's tough to complain about any lacking features Stuff I liked: • Battery life is phenomenal both through the case and earbuds themselves • Comfy, long wear fit • Sound quality Stuff I'd change: • Controls are too sensitive, sometimes an accidental adjustment will skip songs • Battery indicator on case could be more visible or detailed • Case could be smaller These are a great option for basic headphones, if you like this in-ear stemless design, spend a few more bucks on the Tozo NC9 standard model which has excellent ANC and a smaller case with better display I always like to mention Tozo has had  great customer support with me via email, it may take a day or two, but they are always kind and helpful

author: Ronalda S.P.
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsWould not purchase again
body: Stopped working after 6mths. No drops. No rough handling.  Just stopped working. Great while it worked

author: Christiane
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsModern Earbuds Perfect for Workouts and Everyday Use
body: I recently got the Tozo T6 earbuds and wanted to share my thoughts—they're really a great value. The sound quality is excellent, with clear audio and strong bass, making them perfect for listening to music during workouts or runs. They're also incredibly lightweight and fit securely, so I don't have to worry about them falling out, even when I'm running. I also appreciate that they're waterproof with an IPX8 rating and have a long battery life, offering about 10 hours per charge. Plus, they come with a convenient wireless charging case, and you also have the option to charge them via USB cable. If you're looking for a solid ​ and modern pair of earbuds for everyday listening or workouts, the TOZO T6 is a strong contender.

author: C. Wallace
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSounds Good
body: Quality sound, good for phone calls  and long battery life.

author: Laura Sepp
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAwesome sound, high value for price.
body: Excellent sound and noise cancellation. Long battery life.  Comfortable fit. Another great quality product by TOZO!

author: TJTMartin
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks great!
body: Nice clarity and ready to use right out of the box. I wear at least one all night with sleep. Sounds sometimes I use both. They lasted an extremely long time. Did not send a signal saying battery low fit comfortably. Easy to charge wirelessly which is what I do. You have the option with the cable just in case as well.

body: Clear sound quality and are super comfortable to wear (I have small ears and most buds hurt). I use 1 at a time at work and they always last 7.5 hours on a single charge and easily connect to my echo show.

body: I’ve had many pairs of tozo headphones. This was the worst. Connectivity issues, poor quality audio, terrible quality on phone calls. I will not buy this specific model ever again.

author: Ltudares

author: Made in 'Merica
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest earbuds for the price!
body: Love these earbuds. They're ipx8 waterproof which is pretty awesome.  They're light... comfortable. And the audio is incredible. I don't know how they manage to nail all aspects of the audio.  Highs are crisp..mids are perfectly balanced with now muffle and the bass thumps.  I've used their app many times but with these particular buds.. there is no need. They sound perfect out of the box. Awesome set of buds I have been using daily at work and the gym. Super impressed by them!

author: M. Ramos
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsQuality
body: Meh, I thought it was going to be the same as my 2022 ones but it's made out of a cheaper plastic. Like all around. I hope the sound quality it the same at least. But I just happen to get new ones because I thought I lost the old ones. But nope he they are side by side. I know I know the tariffs but still quality man. 😐 right original left new.

author: Thomas Cook
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat earbuds
body: Good ear buds. Nice clear sound.  Love the wireless charger feature.

author: Actual User
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThere are very good ear buds for the price.
body: There are very good ear buds. But most earbuds are good these days. What sets these apart is the customer service. It is prompt, courteous and respectful. I had an issue, sent an email and customer service was all over it. Now I am a happy customer. Pairing is typical today and you get good Bluetooth range. I primary use them to listen to TV and the sound range covers all the bases. They fit fine and quality of workmanship is good. The only issue I have is the magnets that hold the ear buds against the charging pins in their case. They are very powerful (which is good so they hold the ear buds in place and make good contact with the charging pins and  they don't fall out when you open the case) but it can be a little difficult to remove the ear buds when trying to remove them with my fat fingers.

author: Leathlie
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDisappointment
body: Not even a week in and the right earbud has no sound. According to the app, both sides are fully charged, and the right side’s touch controls work, but no matter how long I leave the right earbud in the charging case (either alone or with the left one), nothing changes. I’ve disconnected and re-connected the Bluetooth connections many times as well. Absolutely useless. As affordable as these are, they are still a waste of money.

author: Luke V
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsLaughably faulty.
body: Three main problems: 1. The earbuds don't charge in the case unless the case itself is plugged in. It doesn't seem as if the case can even hold a charge. 2. The earbuds randomly connect to my phone even when they're inside the case and it's shut. Super annoying. 3. The left earbud doesn't automatically connect when you take it out. Laughably faulty earbuds. I'm not happy.

Terrible physical design, and I HATE TO USE THEM, and compared to the TAGRY X08 that I am also using that I would rate 5-stars, I would rate this product 1-star, mainly due to TERRIBLE SIZE AND FITTING, but also due to lower quality sound and non-user-friendly touch controls, and very small range of wireless connectivity. Color is also not great. Would have returned them immediately but stuck as I get them overseas. Overall, I am totally disappointed with these!

author: Tex D.(OK)
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsFound in the streer drain  and still work

Brought them inside and just let them dry out. No rice or anything else. Just basically shook the water out of them and that was it. And they were full of water. Both the headphones and case still held a charge. Unbelievably impressive for such a low price.

The case is smooth and fits well in my pocket, I like the battery life display though it doesn't show how charged it is until you plug it in. My biggest complaint is that the lowest volume is still very loud. Sometimes I want to just have a quiet background noise while I'm working but that isn't really possible with these

author: Kari R
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNot the same shape as older version of T6
body: I recently purchased my third pair of these, using the same product link from my previous orders. However, the pair I received most recently is a different model. They are all "T6" according to the product listing, but these are a different shape and the charging case is a different size. The old T6s were interchangeable between left and right, as the part that goes into your ear was straight. The new version is angled, so that they are no longer interchangeable. I wear one while I fall asleep and switch it from ear to ear when I roll over. So it matters that each bud fits in both ears comfortably. Also, the new charger case does not fit in my old protective silicone case, as the new version has different dimensions. Disappointed, I liked the old ones better, and can’t use my existing silicone case.

author: Joan G.
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsAmazing buds for the price!!!!
body: I'm rating these 4 stars because the pairing for the earbuds isn't easily done. It took me some time to do even as it appears that I followed pairing instructions. Aside from the pairing issue, these earbuds are a gem! Like OMG they're terrific. For one, they just slide in (more like glide in) to your ears. The fit is perfect in every way. It gives a very strong seal. The fit, I couldn't ask for better. They fit better than some $1000 earbuds I've tried! Yeah seriously... If you want very good sound at a very very reasonable price, these are your buds. They're lightweight too. If it weren't for the pairing issue these would definitely be a 5 stars.

author: Alejandra Xona
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPrecio
body: Tengo varios meses que lo compré pero realmente es admirable lo resistente que son para el precio y sobre todo pasan semanas para que se descarguen!!

author: Frankie & Beans
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsImportant flaw to consider
body: I have a couple pairs.  The sound is decent but lacking bass. The biggest problem is when you put them in its case after usage you have to unpair from your phone otherwise you won't be able to hear your phone ring because it's still connected.  Then you need to go through the pairing process everytime.  This is a major flaw as Ive missed many important calls due to this issue. These are now my backup headphones.  I would find another solution.

author: Brenda Swaby
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsReturn order by mistake

author: E. Gilder
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsSolid value priced ear buds! Consider these
body: Really solid earbuds!  TOZO T6 earbuds are for those seeking affordable waterproof wireless earbuds with good sound quality and a comfortable fit. They include multiple ear tip options for everyone’s ear size. Great for casual use, workouts, biking and commuting. Battery life is strong….around 6-8 hours of playtime per charge, with the charging case offering multiple additional charges for extended listening. This is important if you're taking public transportation, going for long walks or need to listen to something at night. Sound quality is fine however I think bass response could be better. The IPX8 Waterproof Rating allows the earbuds to withstand sweat, rain, and submersion in water. This makes them perfect for workouts and outdoor activities. Call quality is average. Good in quiet environments but the microphone struggles in noisy conditions. Unfortunately there is no Active Noise Cancellation (ANC). With only a couple of shortcomings, these are currently my favorite value priced ear buds yet!

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsFit and sound are perfect!
body: Great sound and fit so good! Love the sleek style and ease of connectivity! Great price too! Perfect size and weight bar I love the case they go in.

author: Sebastian
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound quality.
body: Sounds quality is great and they are comfortable to wear for extended periods.

author: Abbas
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsperformance, comfort, and value
body: As an active guy who's constantly on the move—whether at the gym, running outdoors, or just powering through a busy day, the TOZO T6 earbuds have seriously impressed me. They’re lightweight, comfortable, and most importantly, they stay put. I don’t have to keep adjusting them mid-workout, which is a huge win. The IPX8 waterproof rating is no joke either—I've even worn them in the shower post-run, and they still perform like new. Sound-wise, they hit a sweet spot. The bass has that nice thump when it matters, and the clarity across highs and mids is solid, especially after tweaking the EQ in the TOZO app. They’re not the most powerful in raw volume, but the soundstage is balanced and immersive. For the price? These are a steal. Battery life is reliable, and I appreciate the LED indicator on the case, even if the lid feels a bit light. The passive noise cancellation is surprisingly efective, once the music kicks in, background distractions fade fast. All in all, they’re a killer combo of performance, comfort, and value. Highly recommend for anyone with an active lifestyle.

author: MATT  Chandler
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLoudest ear buds I have tried yet
body: These are by far louder than all the other ear buds in past they stay charged for a long time and only pair of ear buds I actually have to turn down on some songs but crystal clear

They sound great for the price (they have a little extra bass), are fairly light, fit well (at least in my ears), and are fairly small even with the case. The companion app and avalible tracker are also a nice touch for free. Don't fall for scams like Raycons, get these!

Anyway, they have great sound quality. They're very comfortable and the battery life is pretty long. They also work with my wireless charger, which is a plus!

author: Melissa🐬💛
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNoise cancellation and ear comfort
body: NOISE CANCELLATION This is my third time purchasing this same Tozo T6 airbuds, first ones were for me and I got obsessed with them because I was looking for a pair of airbuds that could cancel all the noise, cause for me a person that takes public transportation everyday, it is a nightmare having to listen to peoples conversations at 6am like are you serious? Jaja but God saved me when I found these ones, they cancel all the noise 😭 I could not believe it but it is true, also the quality sound is good, these have some good bass configuration. Something I would like to enfatize is about the charging life, I usually charge the case only once per week or when I remember😂 cause the case battery last a lotttttt, and well after all of that I got one for my sister and another pair for my cousin as a gift cause I could not help and keep them only to myself. They feel comfortable in the ears, if you are into sports or you do workout everyday these are the ones for you, I started jumping the rope and they stay put no matter how much I jump or move… I just love them sorry😂😭

body: Excelente me encanta la verdad, Compré estos audifonos  inalámbrico para trabajar desde casa, y superó mis expectativas. Se conecta rápido, la batería dura mucho y es cómodo incluso después de varias horas. Ya había probado otras marcas más caras y no sentí mucha diferencia. author: K. Barrett
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsQuality earbuds at a great price!
body: My favorite earbuds! The charge on these earbuds last all day, which is so important if you're taking public transportation go work, going for long walks, or suffering from insomnia and need to listen to something to get you through the night. I'm not a person who will spend hundreds of dollars on earbuds. I want quality and reliability at a fantastic price, and that's what you get with TOZO. I loved the TOZO 10 buds but these TOZO6 are even better. Great sound, rapid charging, really easy Bluetooth connectivity. Just put them in your eats and start listening. The channel changing, volume control, etc. are very intuitive. Plus the price is so affordable. These are my favorite ear buds yet.

author: Shopping mama
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat little find!
body: I have used these for several months-they are awesome!! Fit is comfortable. Easy to connect. Wireless charging is no hassle!  Great value for the money! Quality is exceptional. I walk with them almost daily and they are exactly what I wanted and needed to keep me motivated!

author: Beth A Trevino
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent Noise Cancelling Ear Buds from TOZO 6
body: Hello Future Customers, I wholeheartedly recommend these TOZO ear buds, they are very comfortable and the sound quality is excellent. I also enjoy that they easily connect with my television set. Another excellent feature about this product is the noice cancelling feature is very effective, especially when I am trying to listen music in bed and my dog is sleeping/snoring right next to me. I highly recommend these TOZO 6 ear buds. Sincerely, Miguel Rangel

author: Oregon Baker
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product
body: I use these for sound and noise cancellation. Works well for both. A bit frustrating pairing at times, but many ear buds are.

author: GCheck
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks as advertised and looks great while doing it!

author: Amazon Customer

author: Roger McManus
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPriced below true value...
body: I’ve used several TOZO earbuds and consistently appreciated their sound quality, comfortable fit, and strong value. These hybrids are my first with the hanging design, and while it's a change from what I’m used to, they perform impressively. The noise canceling works well, and the audio clarity exceeded my expectations for this price point. I also had a minor issue that their customer support helped me resolve quickly and professionally. Overall, I’m very satisfied with the product and the company’s responsiveness.

author: Neill
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Value for the price
body: Great Value for the price. Very easy to use and the battery lasts

author: Bingbong
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSurvived the washing machine, would recommend
body: - audio quality is good and clear - has many different sizes of replaceable buds - comfortable, but like any earbuds, will get a bit uncomfortable after prolonged listening (2+ hours) - simple to connect - has long battery life, it could probably last a week with just using the charging case if you only listen for 1-3 hours everyday - I would have given it 4 stars since the previous points should be standard for good earbuds, but I left it in the washing machine on accident and it miraculously survived without any significant damages. This last point is the winning one for me.

The mic to talk in is trash and others can't hear you talking.  The design and size are great.  They seem to stay connected to my phone.

author: Chipper
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWow! These are great earbuds!
body: Buy these!! Wow! So surprised by how good these are for the price! I have a set of Bose and wanted another set for work, but didn't want to spend that kind of money again.  I bought these thinking if they weren't good or did not fit well I'd just send them back. Got them the next day and I am pleasantly surprised at the sound quality and how comfortably they fit in my ear.  They paired quickly and easily- you lift the ear buds out of the case to pair to your device (no button to press).  I also like the features like being able to lower or increase volume by tapping one ear bud or another. So much value for the price!!!  Also- if you have a kid who loses things and you don't want to risk getting them AirPods, get these.

But if I get any ounce of sweaty they start either suctioning into my ear which feels so crazy on my ear drum or they just fall out. I will prob be going back to AirPods after these. Wanted to like them more but they don’t work for my smaller ears. Sound is decent though when they stay in place

One was at the bottom for 5-10 minutes before I realized it! I put back in case, left in our truck (extremely hot) for a couple days….worked like a charm! The sound is perfect! My son and husband own a pair also and rate them 5 star!

Its perfect for all sizes of ear because it comes with 4 different cushions you can change out for the size that best fits your ears. The only thing that could improve is the noise cancellation. I wore it on a plane and could hear things around me. Other than that the sound quality is great.

author: Callee
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product, Great Customer Experience

The buds are designed to stay on your ear. I stay with Tozo because they stand behind their product. I keep buying because I want their newest products. Their customer service is great and they seem to always do what is best for the customer.

author: Huafoley
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsPrevious order was defective
body: This review refers to a previous order that I returned. After receiving the replacement, it became clear that the original item was not only used but also defective. It's disappointing that a defective product was sent in the first place. I spent over an hour trying to pair it with my Bluetooth, to no avail. I hope the seller takes better care with quality control moving forward.

author: scott coleman
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAmazing Sound and Style in One Compact Package!
body: I recently purchased the TOZO wireless earbuds in pink, and I am beyond impressed! The design is sleek and stylish — the soft pink color adds a nice personal touch without being too flashy. They're compact and comfortable, especially with the small size option that fits my ears perfectly. The sound quality is outstanding for the price. The bass is rich, vocals are clear, and the immersive sound experience makes listening to music, podcasts, or taking calls a real pleasure. The dual mic setup ensures my voice comes through clearly on calls, even in noisy environments. Battery life is solid, and the charging case is lightweight yet durable. The pairing process was seamless, and the customization through the app with 32 EQ presets is a great bonus for audiophiles. Another plus — they’re waterproof (IPX5), which gives me peace of mind during workouts or unexpected rain. Overall, a fantastic product that offers premium features at a budget-friendly price. Highly recommended!

author: Jenni Sun☀️

The earbuds still work, but the right  side’s volume is extremely low and won’t increase. Also, the charge doesn’t last longer than an hour or two anymore. May purchase a different tozo earbud next.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsEasy to use
body: Earbuds charge right in the case with the supplied USB cord. They turn on automatically when removed from the case. Bluetooth pairing is quick and easy. Audio level is adjustable but you need to read the instructions first. Audio quality is a bit tinny but suitable for movies and voice. They seem to fit a bit loose and my concern is going to be about losing one of them while their are in use.

author: lk
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMake sure you have the correct fit then the sound is amazing
body: So I got the A1 and enjoyed them but could never get the bass right or fit. These were made for "small" ears. Even their larger earbud covers were to small and I heard to much street noise and Bass was very low. I held them in with my hands and the bass was there. I happen to have the same ear bud covers and I put the large ones on and bam, the bass was back with a pleasant overall tone and sound.  Problem was I couldn't charge them due to the increase size. They were not meant for it. I talked with Tozo and they had me try their hybrid Crystal Pods and that is the correct size for my ears and the sound for the money is amazing with enough satisfying bass. These are a great value for the money with very good sound. It's not their fault my ears are too large. Many people need smaller earbuds for their smaller ear canals. Here is your solution for a great price. Their customer service is second to none also . Very impressed with their products.

author: Christine D.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsTiny buds, BIG sound!
body: I wasn’t expecting much at this price, but WOW ,  these TOZO A1 earbuds are awesome!  Super lightweight, comfy, and they stay put whether I’m walking, cleaning, or dancing in my kitchen like nobody’s watching. The sound? **Surprisingly rich and punchy.** The bass hits just right without being overwhelming, and voices come through super clear......great for music, listening to my glamorize podcasts and STILL taking calls. I love that there are **32 EQ presets** in the app, so you can totally customize the vibe depending on your mood (I’ve been living in “Deep Bass” mode lately). The bluetooth 5.3 connection is rock solid, pairing is instant, and the dual mics work great for calls, even in noisy spaces ( like at my workplace)  And the best part? They’re "IPX5 waterproof" , so I’ve had no issues during sweaty workouts or surprise rainy walks. Battery life is very good, and the little charging case is super pocket-friendly. Honestly, these feel way more premium than their price tag.

author: cd
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsDecent
body: This is my 2nd purchase of the Tozo A1 ear buds. My review of this recent purchase is compared from my older pair. Packaging: Current: Lightweight, efficient, decent protection, plastic tray Previous packaging was better, better quality, looked professionally packed Packing contents: Limited/Missing rubber cap sizes. There were way more sizes in my previous purchase Product review: 1. No real way to tell how much charge is left in battaries with a single LED on case. Previous case had 4 small LED lights which gave you an idea how much charge is left. 2. Fit is as good as previous, I was lucky given the limited amount of rubber cap sizes that came with the package. 3. Sound quality is good but seems softer than previous purchase, compared side by side. Clarity is negligible with less color with the new purchase. Perhaps that is a good thing. 4. A little difficult to get ear buds out of charging case, but understandable if size matters. 5. Auto power off does not seem to work. Ear buds were left out of the case for 10 min, they were still powered on. 6. Music functionality works, seems to work while streaming videos too on smart TV. 7. Call control and Voice assistant seems to work fine 8. There is a phone app that has a function to update firmware for the earbuds according to the manual. I wish there was a computer desktop app instead. 9. Manual does not indicate any functionality on muting voice calls. This is unfortunate. Summary: All in all, the ear buds are decent for the price. Yes I would buy them again in the future.

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMy 5 star experience...
body: I purchased these earbuds 5 months ago. They are smaller and more comfortable than a different brand that I bought before. The clear sound and quick response to touch is better than my old one. Recently, the left bud stopped working. I did troubleshooting as directed by mfg TOZO, but was unsuccessful trying to revive it. Fortunately, I had scanned the code on the box when I opened it, which gave me the extended warranty for free! They sent me a new replacement pair with NO hesitation. Thank you Fiona at TOZO.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsDurability even through the washer and dryer.
body: I don’t usually do many reviews but I had to write one for this. The durability. I work on a farm and they are constantly in my pocket and will stick one in to listen to podcast or music while working. They take up a lot of dirt and hay and sweat and yet still work flawlessly. Most impressed, I washed them yesterday, case and all. Earbuds fell out of the case and were stirred around. Washed and went through full dry cycle too. Put them back in case and took to work, still working perfectly. Amazed!

title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot worth the purchase
body: Not good at all! There is absolutely no bass whatsoever. Horrible scratchy sound all in mono. Do not recommend.

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWork Great
body: For the price they are excellent. Easy to connect and charge . Just bought another. Great gifts for anyone

body: Great for price.
