title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLove these earbuds!!!
body: These earbuds are light and very comfortable. The sound quality is superb and they connected so easily. The TOZO app works great too and  offer some cool adjustments. Also the battery life is great. Highly recommend these earbuds.

author: JOHN
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsno me gusto
body: :( voy por otra marca

author: Ricky Dickson
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat head set at a great price!
body: Sounds great, has more bass than other headsets, the anc is really good, and compared to other brands the price is a good deal especially if you can catch these on sale like I did during prime days. Material and construction feels durable. They fit good and are comfortable. Fairly lightweight.

author: J P
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNC headphones
body: Excellent sound and easy to operate.

author: Alex
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsLow quality.
body: Songs will randomly just stop playing. Sounds will randomly sound hollow for several seconds at a time. Not a quality product for how much it is.

author: Tom
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks great
body: Awesome product for the money

author: Amazon Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsEarmuffs aged and peeling
body: After 3 years of use the ear cups started to fall off and the durability is not good, the. What to do?

author: James Phillips
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDurability concerns. Cup to headband joint broke and frame fell apart after return window closed..
body: Great head phones but the frame is very fragile especially the small arm connecting cups to headband. It eventually broke and the frame fell apart not long after return window closed. I repaired them with foil tape because the sound and features are very good. They still work great but look ugly. So the Durability is not the greatest. Be very gently and watch for this defect if you do purchase.

author: Denise Sheckler
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSatisfied customer
body: The product was received timely as indicated and the quality of the product was good.  Very satisfied customer.

author: Jia H.
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNot comfortable
body: Not comfortable

author: Andrea
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Headphones — Worth It!
body: The media could not be loaded. Five stars! I loved them — great sound, super comfy, beautiful color, and amazing noise cancellation. The app lets you customize the music to your style. Totally worth it!

author: Amanda K.
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsCall quality bad
body: Call quality is so bad.

author: Melissa Davis
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWill not hold a charge
body: worked great for a few months, but now it won't hold a charge. I noticed a couple of times where I had it plugged in to charge for hours, and then I would use them and they'd work for maybe 10 minutes and cut off.  I thought it was a fluke, or that the charging cable just wasn't fully plugged in. But now I can't use these because they don't hold a charge at all, no matter how long they've been plugged in to charge.

author: Armando Balza de Avila
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMuy buenos
body: Excelente

author: Jason Ashley
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood quality -- some problems with calls
body: I got these headphones around a year ago, and I have been enjoying them! The sound quality is great, and they're well made -- there's very little physical wear, to the point they're still close to how I got them, despite certainly getting their use. It's also very comfortable, and the noise canceling certainly does it's job. I do like how it has a transparent mode, even if I don't use it as often. The main problem I've had with them is the microphone. I've been told by multiple people how subpar the audio can be for calls, and occasionally I'd be in a call and the other person's audio will just suddenly degrade to that "robot" sound. The only thing that'd fix it when that happens is a complete power off and back on of the headphones. But it has happened multiple times on a single call more than once, which prevents me from giving it the full 5 stars. Other than that, though, this is a headset that I've been very happy with! Especially for the price, this is a good headphone if you want something reliable without breaking the bank.

author: Greg
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNice upgrade
body: Great headphones for the price. The noise canceling is much better than the Q20.

author: santiago patarroyo rengifo
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcelente
body: Excelente

author: Claire
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWould buy again and again.
body: I love these headphones. Everytime I have previously bought a pair they were stolen by my children. Now that all the kids finally have a pair, I made the mistake of trying the JBL brand for myself - more expensive and not even noise cancelling. That was a disappointment so I came back to my tried and true. These are affordable and are great quality. The headphones adjust to different head sizes so anyone from kids to big headed adults can wear them. They are durable as my kids are a little rough and their headphones are holding up well. Connectivity is easy. Volume control is easy. The noise cancelling makes things like mowing the lawn and ignoring the kids fun and easy!

author: E.B. B.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat
body: Fantastic

author: Customer
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDecent noise cancelling headphones
body: These noise cancelling headphones are good for the price, noise cancelling and sound quality is pretty good, overall a solid headphone

author: DW
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDurable
body: I bought this in December of 2021. after regular use this is what it looks like now July 2025. It's ugly but it still works.

author: Maurice
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound
body: Great quality sound. Easy connect

author: JP97392
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsMade with cheaper plastics.
body: Good set of headphones but made with cheaper plastic. They work but are now held together with duct tape.

author: MaritDW
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsReally good noise cancelling and great fit
body: Good sound. Really good noise cancelling while playing. powerful. Comfortable over my big ears. Wish you could measure your ears and then buy accordingly. But these are big enough.

author: Misty Ward
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat for anyone with sensory issues.
body: This version of Soundcore Life is so comfortable. Amazing for a budget friendly option. The transparency mode is much better than expected. I was shocked with the quality. With a teen with sensory issues these will become a staple in our household. They sound wonderful. Battery lasts for a long time. Various color options. Also comes with a case. It’s very quick and simple to connect them via bluetooth. Volume is able to be controlled on the headphones or the device that its con too. I have 4 children aging 17 to 3 and these fit them all comfortably. I’m hoping they hold up to everyday life and have a long durable quality. My teen can be rough on things.

author: Camden
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNever Declined in Quality
body: These headphones are miraculous. I have had them for 2.5 years and I went on a 3 week trip and charged them 3 times. These headphones have sounded amazing the entire time and the sound cancelation is amazing for flights. I wear them in light rain and when I’m mowing the lawn. These headphones are amazing and have performed even better than the Bose headphones I had previously used.

author: Brian & Deanna Charles
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat for price
body: These are great for the price point. I could have spent more for a better comfort and for more noise cancelling options, but for the times I will be wearing these they are great. There's an option to completely cancel surrounding noise and only hear your sound or to just damper outside noise. They're comfortable but I wouldn't want to wear them all day. They don't fall off my head and are easy to adjust and use.

author: gusbuf
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat headphones for the price!
body: Major bang for your buck, just like all Anker Soundcore products. Are they the best ANC headphones? Of course not. Are they really good for the price? Absolutely.

author: Adam Fairchild
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsCan't miss quality
body: These headphone were exactly what I wanted. They are comfortable to wear and the sounds quality is top notch. I have several pairs of headphones and ear buds SoundCore and love them all.

author: Felipe sanabria
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcelentes
body: Hermoso color y sonido decente, mi mujer los ama

author: Neketa
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product
body: My son love this. When it's on you hear nothing else other than your music

author: Amazon Customer
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsNo ANC function when used with the 3.5mm cable, stupid design.
body: The sound is a little better that the more expensive JBL Live 770NC. But not suitable for in-flight entertainment. Pitty. The headsets are comfortable. They turn off when a 3.5mm plug it's connected and the ANC turns off with it. I didn't read the description before buying but this shortcoming is mentioned. In contrast the JBLs stay on even when the cable is connected.

author: Pat I Rodriguez
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsHeadphones
body: Gift and person loves

author: Brianna
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAmazing value and performance!
body: These headphones are soooo comfy and they sound superb! The battery life is excellent, especially compared to earbuds, and the noise canceling works great. I also love the “transparency mode,” which lets ambient sound in through the headphones instead of blocking it out. I often watch movies with my long-distance bestie, so it lets me hear the movie clearly while talking to her on the phone. I recently bought a pair of Sony WH-1000XM4s to compare, and I couldn’t hear a noticeable difference in sound quality — definitely not a ~$300 difference. These are also significantly more comfortable than the Sonys (softer cushions and lighter weight), plus they come in pink!

author: María J. Cabrera
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSo happy with these!
body: Ive been using them for a few weeks and I think they’re the perfect headphones. What you’re getting for the price is just excellent!

author: S. M.
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsVery good sound but flimsy plastic headband — review update
body: I really like the sound of these headphones and the noise reduction is very good! In fact, it’s much better than the $300 Sony wireless Bluetooth headphones that I have. Unfortunately, I was listening to them while I was in bed and woke up with the headband broken right near the swivel point of the ear piece. I ended up having to duct tape it together. And I didn’t have this headphones very long. It’s sad really Because I really like the sound of the headphones. I read other reviews. There were people that had the same problem. This is very surprising because Anker makes good quality electronics and I own lots of different Anker products. The only reason I gave it three out of five is because of the sound quality. Otherwise, I would’ve given it one star. *** update ***  July 30, 2025 It turns out Anker reached out to me about my issue—I hadn’t even contacted them first. They must’ve seen my review and responded. To my surprise, they offered to either replace the headphones or issue a full refund. I chose the refund because I was concerned the same issue might happen again. I’m giving them four stars due to their excellent customer service. However, I still feel the headband design is inadequate (flimsy). For the record, Anker never asked me to change or update my review, which I truly appreciated. I’m writing this update entirely on my own.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent Buy!
body: Comfortable, affordable and performs to exactly what I needed.

author: S. Lenart
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsNo soft shell case for beige?
body: Whole family got their own pair but the beige only included a beige bag - not a nice case Luke the other colors. Anker wants $13 extra for one. Poor form.

author: Smokey
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood for the ears.
body: I ordered mine almost two years ago.  I like them, although the noise-cancelling feature could be a little better (it's still good, though).  It has a limited range, but I still like them.  They just broke yesterday, but I'm ordering a new pair.

author: P.B. Salamon
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsANC doesn't work with 3.5mm input  Why?
body: First of all, these don't sound very good.  They have a upper bass/lower midrange muddiness.  Kinda like everything is being played through a metal coffee can.  I am an audio engineer who has heard many different headphones and these sound bad.  Not the worst I have heard, but definitely near the bottom. Secondly, if you connect them to a source via the 3.5 mm jack, the noise cancelation does not work.  Why?  I have plenty of sources that do not have Bluetooth, so that means I can't use the ANC?  Stupid design. These are not all bad.  They're comfortable.  They fold down and have a nifty zippered case. I returned them.

author: Jaime Bustos Geek Lab
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsCalidad de sonido increíble y comodidad todo el día
body: Los Soundcore Life Q30 han superado mis expectativas. La calidad de sonido es excelente, con graves potentes, agudos claros y un balance perfecto para todo tipo de música. La cancelación activa de ruido funciona de maravilla, eliminando el ruido ambiental y permitiendo una experiencia de escucha inmersiva. Son muy cómodos, incluso después de horas de uso, gracias a sus almohadillas suaves y diadema ajustable. La batería es otro punto fuerte: dura fácilmente más de 40 horas, y la carga rápida es muy útil. ¡Una opción de calidad premium a un precio accesible!

author: Josh
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsSound is fine, but headphones fall apart
body: The Sound quality is fine, but the build quality leaves something to be desired. This is my second pair in two years and it just broke. First one ear padding fell apart and fell off. Now this newest pair the entire left ear piece cracked and is falling off, no longer stays on my head. I don't sleep or workout with them, just wear them at work sitting at my desk, so it's pretty wild they're breaking. Initially got them cause they are well reviewed and inexpensive, but if I'm buying a new set every year, how much money am I really saving?

author: Adriana Barriga
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBuenos bajos
body: Excelente, se recibe lo que se pide. Los audífonos para su valor están muy bien y el sonido de los bajos es lo que mas me gusta.

author: Litzabel Melendez
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product
body: Muy buena calidad, se escuchan muy bien, muy buen precio para la calidad que tiene

author: John W. Gregg
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNo latency in BT mode.
body: Great price ($63.99). Good sound. Good noise canceling. Great call quality (for both parties). Most importantly (to me) no latency problems when using Bluetooth at all, which makes these perfect for video.

author: Rhonda Robinson
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsNot as nice as the 20
body: They’re lighter than the 20 but the buttons to turn it on off and control. It don’t seem quite as handy either tougher to use. I wish I’d have re-ordered the 20 instead but they do work.

author: E. Sharlow
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsThere's a good chance these won't work wirelessly on PC.
body: I'll be the voice of reason here and say the Q30s don't work on PC for wireless. Constant disconnects after ~30 seconds. Do not buy them. There are multiple threads about this from months past. I went with them after checking reddit threads where they're heavily recommended, don't trust it. Just get something else. I tried everything, uninstalls, reinstalls, drivers, firmware, windows power settings. None of it works. STAY. AWAY.

author: Edinson
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDecepcionado
body: Muy decepcionado 😞 😥 😔 el cable de 3.5 mm estaba defectuoso, el estuche no es el rígido si no uno de tela que sinceramente me parece una basura. Compre estos audífonos esperando el estuche rigido y no estaba, esta nueva versión de los q30 es muy mala, a diferencia de la anterior, realmente estoy pensando en devolverlos o no, por que el producto en si es muy bueno, pero los accesorios decepcionan, cable dañado y sin el estuche que otros usuarios si resivieron.

author: Julie E. Anderson
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNot recommended for people who suffer from headaches.
body: The sound quality is good and everything works as it should except one thing makes these mostly unusable for me. They're too tight on the ears to the point of being uncomfortable and painful.  I have TMJ and the tight fit causes my ears and jaw to hurt.  I can only wear them for about 1/2 an hour before it gets to be too much and I have to take them off.

author: Joshua M.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsCustomize your listening experience! Quality Sound
body: I screenshotted my equalizer settings. Highly recommend listening to "So Free" by Vin Bogart if you try my settings. It's what I used to achieve the sound experience I like. These headsets are amazing. The sound is smooth and provides a nice, clean level of base. Here is a quick breakdown of what I like. PROS 1. Comfortable on the ears - wore for 5 hours the days I got them and didn't have any major discomfort 2. Sound quality - hard to beat for the price 3. Download the app - you can choose a variety of settings based on your preference whether you like R&B, Rock, or even podcasts. If you know how to use an equalizer, you can customize your own settings. The app is very clean as well. 4. Easy setup 5. Durable with a nice weight to them 6. Great for wearing while working (if your job requires longer periods of isolated work), doing chores, yard work, easy workouts (don't recommend high intensity, may not stay on) 7. Long battery life with super fast charging ability CONS 1. I purchased the black headset and only got a bag to store them in. Ordered my wife the navy color and she got a hard case. I ended up ordering a case later on. Overall, these are phenomenal noise canceling headsets for the price. Great sound quality, fits well, sleek look, great app functionality.

author: Clayton Miller
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLoud Office? Noise Cancelled. Now I’m Zen AF
body: These headphones saved me from the loudmouths at the office. They block out noise like magic. I could finally focus without hearing every chatty coworker nearby. Now I work from home and slap these bad boys on for music and meditation. The sound is so good, I actually feel the beats. Easy to connect, battery lasts forever, and the case keeps them safe. Plus, they fit like a dream, no headache here. If you want to drown out the chaos and get your zen on, these are it!

author: Judith E. Quinones
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcelente
body: Muy cómodos y buen sonido

author: Serena
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsUndurable headphones, but amazing noise cancellation
body: I got these headphones 18 months ago apparently, and despite me taking perfect care of my headphones, first the fabric started peeling off of my left earmuff which is ridiculous, next the headphones head bar cracked and I'm not even sure when I just noticed yesterday, so I wouldn't say these are durable at all! I had JBL headphones and those last me years but had other issues but they were insanely durable, I got these headphones because they had better noise cancellation (which is true). At first they would fall off my head but after 2-3 days they fitted perfectly and stopped falling off entirely. I used to workout with them and no matter the exercise they would stay on snug, running, weightlifting, just fine. No technical issues ever, but turning the headphones off takes forever and most times doesn't work for me so I'd just disconnect them from my device and then turn off on its own so it was easier that way. The app they have is nice but it keeps logging me out so I barely used it. Disappointed with the Soubdcore company though because they make it so hard to get these headphones sent back in and I just did it through the warranty I bought with the headphones, instead of letting me send it for repair they sent me money and I just wanted them repaired so now I have to figure out what to even buy now or just buy these again which pisses me off.

author: Kimberly & Byron
title: 5.0 out of 5 stars10 outta 10
body: They are comfortable and very efficient with the noise canceling. I didn't know sound could sound so good before buying these.

author: Panda Strife
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDurability needs a massive upgrade
body: Good sound quality, okay noise canceling, but the cheap plastic is already cracking pretty bad after only 4 months of use Customer service is really good, didn't expect me to change my rating and that's why I did, they reached out to me and sent me a replacement,  let's see if the original ones I bought were just faulty or if the plastic really isnt durable

author: Nick
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDownload the app!
body: For the price these are pretty great! You absolutely must download and use the app to adjust the equalizer for the best results. I like the acoustic setting best so far. For standard pop music these are fantastic. For classical/soundtrack I'm gonna investigate some other options.

author: Reda Adaou
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest headset I have bought so far, affordable, high quality, reliable.
body: I have used these headphones for a while now and I recommend them to anyone who wants to get a great headset for an affordable price range with high audio quality and amazing noise cancellation, and high battery capacity, I even got them as an award for a random draw at work for completing a specific training. Highly recommended !!!

author: Gregg Katz
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsExpectations met
body: As advertised

author: Ken
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsCracked After 6 months
body: Cracked After 6 Months, we will see how product support is from Anker, but be advised before purchasing. I thought I was making a reasonable order. The headphones were fine otherwise until now.

author: Cas
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product
body: Very good headphones for noise cancelling and private listening. Easy to use, good fit.

author: Travis Delaine
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsYezzir
body: Ten out of ten, great bass, loud and comfortable

author: Allan
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat for mowing
body: I got these to wear while mowing my yard. I have a large yard that takes about 2 1/2 hours to mow. I've tried bluetooth headphones, (didn't stop mower noise) ear buds with industrial type headphones designed for work safety (my ears don't work well with buds, they fall out). I didn't want to spend $300 for noise cancelling headphones but these came up on Prime day for $55 with a lot of good reviews, so I tried them. I am very happy with the way they work. They don't filter out all the mower noise, but most of it and the music plays loud enough to make mowing a more pleasant chore. When not on the mower they have great sound and with the app you can adjust to your personal liking.

author: Joli
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGreat until 2 years in
body: These have been great for me. They're comfortable enough to wear with glasses, do a good enough job of noise cancelling, and have gotten me through multiple flights (I have ADHD and noise sensitivity). Also, with ADHD, I use these pretty heavily because they really help me focus on what I'm supposed to be focusing on. However, I've now had them for a few months over 2 years and they've started just randomly dropping the bluetooth signal. When I'm connected to both my computer and my phone, they'll often just randomly drop one or the other, or both. Then, it's sometimes difficult to get them reconnected. I'll click on them on the device and it'll spin and then end without connecting. I'll have to turn them off and back on to get them to reconnect.

author: Amanda Aldana
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood headphones
body: Good quality, I would like a rewind and forward button, but great overall

author: Megan Howell
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGood sound quality, don't fit well
body: The sound quality and the noise cancellation are great, but they fit so loose. I wear my headphones in the gym and I have to adjust them every few minutes because they fall off my head, even at the smallest setting.

author: Savel
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNC works perfectly
body: Amazing product for the cost.

author: Mohammed Bello
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt has good sound
body: I heard about it from my friend and I thought it was just promo until I got it. It is the best I promise

author: Chase Atkinson
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood bang for your buck
body: Good sound quality and noise cancelling. Ears get very hot

author: Tony Kirk
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsTouch control is a very sensitive
body: Sound quality is good for the price noise canceling is also a good value but I hate the touch control noise canceling feature definitely the biggest downfall of these headphones. I am constantly accidentally turning off the noise canceling while I'm using these headphones I really wish there was a way to disable the touch control

author: michael l.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsspending less and getting more for value !!!
body: Best  for the money , got mine on Prime day sound great easy to use ,and connect to bluetooth devices

author: Carla Morgan
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsHighly recommend
body: I love them very comfortable and quality sound!

author: Alan Luken
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsDon't Last Long
body: Fine headphones, but don't last. I've had them for about a year and a half and now the cover for the part over the ear has completely come undone. I use these for work and at the gym, nothing crazy that should result in them falling apart so quickly. Frustrating.

author: Ethan Long
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsInsane value
body: Feels good, sounds good, definitely not as good as $350 headphones. But way better bang for your buck. Noise canceling good but doesn't get rid of wind outside very well.

author: Once, Twice, 6 x's a Mommy
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product
body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: Grest price, Great product!  Noise cancelling is top !

author: Brian M.
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWon't stay connected
body: This was my second pair of Soundcore Q30 headphones and I'm very disappointed. They paired right away on Bluetooth but dropped connection within seconds... every time! I tried several troubleshooting guides and nothing worked, so had to return. I won't be coming back to this brand. (My previous pair was picky about connecting but nowhere near this bad. Sound and range were great, but battery lasted < 2 years before dying, much worse than other headphones I own).

author: Mister Smart
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDoes not noise cancel when connected with 3.5 mm jack - defeats the purpose
body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: Purchased these just to use on flights to watch a movie and cancel noise. These do not do that.

author: cds
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsCREAM = NO CASE INCLUDED. BAIT AND SWITCH
body: FALSE LISTING INFORMATION : BEIGE / CREAM = NO CASE INCLUDED. I purchased a Pink Soundcore q30 for myself and loved it so much, so did my daughter. I bought another set in BEIGE/CREAM so that it wouldnt get mixed up . However after delivery I immediately noticed a difference in the fact that that box was totally different. This color also DID NOT come with the carrying case that the pink one did. Why didnt they specify this in the listing more clearly? BAIT AND SWITCH.

author: Ashley Goodenough
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExactly what I wanted!
body: Super comfortable and the noise canceling worked perfect!

author: Amanda Poulin
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsPlastic Breaking and falling apart after only a year
body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: After only 1 year and only using 6 or 7 times,  the plastic on the bottom of both sides of the headset is broken. Little pieces of plastic are falling out of the sides when I wear it.  These should last longer than 7 uses for the price.  So upset,  these are crap.

author: Manjit Singh
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsUnbelievable value and quality for the money I spent on Q30
body: I am pleasantly surprised at the quality and features of this product. for the record I am a hardcore Apple fanboy and everything in my home is apple. The app alone is worth $63 I paid for Q30! I listen to white noises at various times during day (meditation, work, sleep). Apple needs to license their app into iOS or learn from them. Will look into other products from this company ASAP.

author: Sarah
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect for the price
body: Great for the price and you can switch noise cancelling on and off by just a button. Never had a problem with Bluetooth connection either. Bass good too!

author: JBinWyo
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBattery life is really good.
body: I am not a good person to comment upon the sound quality, although I like them a lot. I do want to comment on the battery life. I've used these everyday for at least 2 hours a day for 10 days in a row and finally charged them just to be safe. Someone had commented that the battery only lasted 5 hours, but that just simply is not true. I probably had 25 hours on the battery, if not more, before I charged it and according to my phone they were still at about 50% charged.

author: Anibas
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood quality
body: This Headphone is a perfect choice for anyone looking for a comfortable and reliable everyday listener. I recommend them for daily commutes.

author: murphygirl
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWould recommend to others
body: Comfortable.  Completely noise canceling just as promised. Good sound.

author: Jordan G
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMakes a great gift
body: Fiancée absolutely loves them. Uses them to lock in when she's tryna get work done.

author: millissia george
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEconomical listening quality!
body: To whom it might concern...I really love this particular headset. Ive purchaced twice so far as well as inner ear ones, all from the same company. Truly a quality deal for my $. As I listen to alot of tunes working around house, inside as well as outside I've found that this product can be very pleasing to my ear. Sound quality is quite a treat. The noise cancelling feature is very wonderful. Even the normal settng mode has amplified sound I would normally miss. All in all I give a 5 star rating.

author: book hound
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy listening
body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: good value Charging ability: fast charge

author: Chris Goflin
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBuy these immediately. Better than beats studio pros.
body: These are by far the best budget/affordable headphones I've owned,. I have the beats studio pros, and these are equal if not better then those. Absolutely recommend these. I bought a second pair.

author: Mariam Ramoul
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAffordable and Great Quality
body: I have tried several headphones and wasn’t looking for anything special, i just needed one job, to play sounds lol. When i got these. The noise cancellation feature literally blew my mind. I couldn’t believe how good it was. And the sound was so crisp! I finally understood why people pay so much money for headphones. And i feel so privileged to have found these at such an affordable price!

author: DavidKIT
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Value
body: Great value for the price. The sound quality and noise cancelling function is better than expected. Not sure I would even notice a difference in the higher priced brands. Great for airplanes and mowing the yard.

author: Kaitlin Moore
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsProduct came differently than last time I ordered
body: I ordered two pairs of these about a month ago. When I ordered a third pair for another team member in my office, the headphones arrived with a "travel case" that barely fits the headphones instead of the nicer hard case. I'm not sure why there's suddenly a difference, but I'm not happy because my team needs the hard case for protection on job site visits. Otherwise, the team enjoys the sound quality and comfort of these headphones.

author: AmazonCustomer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsQuality
body: Good quality

author: Janelle
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood!
body: Really good headphones! I've had them for about 2-3 years now and the noise cancelling is good and it works well and hasn't broken(I've dropped them many many times). The only thing is the part around the ear disintegrates due to the material so I have to buy new ones as they are not replaceable.

author: Great hairbrush all around
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood midrange headphones!!
body: I’m really happy with these upon initially receiving. The noice cancelling actually works. These headphones would typically be out of my price range but with the Amazon sale I purchased, so they are nicer than what I’m used to, which is fairly cheap. If you’re a student looking for a nice pair of headphones that come in nice color ways, I’d recommend! Why did you pick this product vs others?: These also by far have the best reviews as far as comfort and reliability go compared to other headphones within similar range like the sony ones.

author: Mike Jones
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsHeadphones broke after very light use
body: First one I got was a lemon but customer service was responsive and sent a replacement. The one I received broke after very light use, the headband part just snapped off. I’m very gentle with my things so I’m disappointed in how fast these headphones broke. I hope customer service will reach out and replace it

author: Michael B.
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsMissing Case
body: No longer appears to come with a case. It comes with a travel pouch even though the soundcore website says it should come with a travel case. The Amazon AI also says it should come with a travel case. Disappointed in having to spend extra on a travel case that it says would be included.

author: Kevin Ramirez
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBuena compra
body: Llegaron bien, funcionan bien hasta el momento

author: Amazon Customer
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsFalls apart after 2 years
body: Excellent battery life but the cushion falls apart after about 2 years. I used this about 45 mins 3 times a week and the left side began to detach itself from the seams, a dropped of crazy glue fixed it but a month later another spot began to separate, a month later the right side started. 5 spot repairs later and its now in the trash.

author: Lauren Frick
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood headphones,  disappointing case
body: Excellent value for the price… The app and the different style of preset equalizer is also a nice touch. They feel great like I will be able to wear them for hours… The one thing I'm disappointed in is the cloth drawstring bag instead of the hard case…disappointed to find that the drawstring bag isn't even big enough to fully close the bag

author: Dale
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent product. Excellent customer service.
body: This set is great. Sound is the best for a lower cost headset. A friend has Bose set and I don’t find this set that much difference.  Being able to equalize the sound on the app is awsome. Customer service is beyond excellence.  My left speaker was failing. Customer service responded within 15 minutes via email asked for some info and performed some test procedures. They concluded the speaker is defective and sent out another set right away. You cannot get much better than that! Buy  Anker soundcore products for peace of mind.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat and worth it.!
body: Great ear piece. Great sound.

author: Derek
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLove em great headphones
body: Awesome sound and quality I wear mine everyday for the gym and my evening runs sound has deep base clear tones and loud

author: Natalie Ervin
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood quality for the price
body: The headphones have great sound and long lasting battery, however, they are a bit tight and hurt my ears after a period of time.

author: Cristian Garcia
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNo es como esperaba
body: Aunque las almohadillas son en material sintético y se que se van a pelar en poco tiempo, la calidad de sonido en audio es buena, por otra parte el micrófono no es muy bueno para llamadas

author: Stephen Strong
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsSmaller ears than expecting
body: I was wanting to order another pair of July bc my other pair had lasted me until my kid broke the ear thing.  It's a good quality headphone just the ear thing barely covers my ears.  Im not sure if this is a kids size or what but its not the same size as my other one.  Im glad I have little ears or I would have shipped them back.  They are to small I the ears for my 15 year old son.  Just be warned this did run smaller than normal Jul might read the specs or something

author: Theresa G.
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsEarpiece falls off and can’t be put back on
body: For one they only give you a 30 day warranty. I purchased them in March gave them to my grandson the end of April and the earpiece keeps falling off and Amazon saying I can’t return them do not buy.

author: SANDRA
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDoes not hold charge
body: The headphones only last 2 hours after fully charged. Would not recommend

author: K’s Recommendations
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat headphones for a great deal
body: Love these headphones. Bluetooth capability, easy volume control, set up is a click of a button and great for plane rides, car rides or listening in bed.

author: georgia reynolds
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound but doesn’t completely cover your ears.
body: Good sound but not noise canceling. My husband likes these but complained they don’t completely cover.

author: AR
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery Durable! Good Quality
body: I've had mine for a good year now, and I'm super impressed with the quality of these headphones, they've been through a lot and still work great. The color is very cute, and I often match the color with a variety of different outfits. They are very easy to connect to Bluetooth off any device, and I can control the volume from the headset without my phone and can walk around the house without it disconnecting. Great Buy!

author: Roger Lodge
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExceeded my expectations
body: I wanted some wireless headphones for exercising. I used to use clip on earphones but have never liked earbuds. I decided to try these larger headphones for a change. They didn't come charged like some devices, but charging didn't take long. The bass response and treble is better than I expected at this price point. The bluetooth connectivity also has good range. I'm not a big bluetooth user, but I have a bluetooth receiver dongle I've used to play audio from my phone into my stereo and it has poor range. However, wearing these headphones I went at least 30 feet away from my phone and they still sounded unaffected by the range.

author: Jazmine
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsDoesn't die fast
body: Works great really loud and great noise canceling

author: Peter Fleming
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsSOME MIGHT FIND THESE SUB-STANDARD
body: I have always been confident of a JBL product. In this case I imagined these headphones might last for more than 4  months

author: Dakota
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsworks great!
body: love them!

author: Rafael P.
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsHead phones
body: Good sound . But made extremely cheap. I mow for a living so it got caught on a branch pulling the head phones off m falling behind the engine got burned and the ear muffs is just an elastic material that comes off totally.

author: Arly
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLa calidad
body: Maravilloso

author: Sharnee Snyder
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsCushion falls off
body: The cushion fell off and I am unable to reattach without using glue. Cheaply made

author: Thheadley
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat for budget or for kids
body: I brought these on October of 2021 and they are still holding up. The ear pads have worn down but for the price and how long they are lasting I can't complain. I will say however that I find myself wanting to turn the volume up but it's already max. I use mainly at the gym. I also sweat on my face which could be why the ears look the way they do. Overall they served me well over the years.

author: Cesar
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsCalidad
body: Buena calidad de sonido

author: Julio César Suárez Viamonte
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsI like
body: The Bluetooth connection is stable and fast, with no interruptions or interference. Additionally, synchronization with the phone was immediate.

author: Adam Sollers
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood headphones for the price
body: Bought these for my dad for Father’s Day. Great price. He loves them.

author: Lillie Corley
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsName brand product not working!
body: Purchased these headphones less than 8 months ago and they just stopped working! The usage was an hour 3 times a week @ the gym.

author: Damien
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsHorrible headphones
body: These are some of the worst headphones I have ever owned. They are painful on the ears since they do not go over them but on top of them. It's hard to where them for long periods of time. They also continuously stop playing audio despite still being connected. It's not that they are low battery or far away, they just randomly stop playing audio mid video. Then I can't even get them to start playing again unless I continuously turn them off and on and disconnect and reconnect. These are absolutely not worth it.

author: amzical
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks great for sensory overload
body: These are not completely noise canceling, but they do enough of a good job that I do not feel overwhelmed on the bus. My flavor of ADHD includes sensory overload, specifically with sound. Just putting in ear plugs on the bus doesn't work because it drowns out most of the background noise, which only makes the noise closer to me that much more stressful. But if I put on these + a soothing anti-anxiety playlist, I'm usually not in a sensory overload/panic attack-type situation. And bonus - headphones work pretty well as a "Don't talk to me" measure

author: Tayler Taggart
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDefective
body: Ordered this product only used a handful of times and charged them twice. Product will not hold a charge and no way to fix. Fake JBL product.

author: Awesome
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsQuality
body: Amazing

author: MONICA IRIGOYEN
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWould recommend
body: These headphones connect easy, have great sound quality, perfect size but a little hard to store with out a case or something. It has a few buttons for volume and power. All of my JBL products have lasted for years, so I’m excited about these headphones.

author: Burly Bird
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood headphones with lots of perks
body: Great sound quality and a comfortable fit. Charging and storage is easy too, as the headphones are not too big. It’s got some side buttons to help with volume and video control as well

author: Feliciano c.
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBrandi name poor quality
body: Not loud enough

author: Jessenia niebles
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsSweet.
body: Love them, It levels up with beats.

author: Numan
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsgood price and value
body: good priced, reliable

author: Jels
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood for calls and listening to music
body: Great sound and great for calls. I use them to workout, battery life has been good. Love the pink color, it's very soft. Connects easily to my phones. The only thing I dislike is that to skip a song you have to keep the volume buttons oressed, but overall, they're great headphones for the price.

author: Lisa Starobinsky
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsgarbage
body: worked for 2 months then stopped turning on, pretty crappy.

author: Donna Connor
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Headphones
body: Great headphones. I have two JBL speakers and they paired perfectly.

author: the rat eater
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLOVEEEEEE THEM😍😍
body: LOVEEEEEE THEM😍 tbh no complaints hereee there definitely worth it especially if this is one of your first pair of headphones. Jesus love yall🫶🏾

author: BibbsBabe
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsToo tight, must return
body: PROS: Great sound quality, callers say my voice was clear voice and I didn't need to speak too loud, the cushions are thick, the blue is beautiful, connectivity was simple, easy to set-up and use, volume controls are easily accessible, lightweight headset which could be good or bad. CONS: Although the cushions are thick, the cups squeezed my ears too tight, the top of the headphones is oddly shaped and applies unnecessary pressure to the arms, the quality of the set feels a little flimsy.

author: Maria Gutierrez
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsOkay
body: They were good and had good audio quality and was easy to connect to phone the one time I used them but personally the design was too small for my ears so ended up giving them away to friend.

author: Rusty
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsComfortable
body: Comfortable. Not loud enough for me.

author: DaniB
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsGood for tiny ears only
body: The ears on these are tiny!  I bought these for my 13 year old son and the ears were too small to fit. The overall headband part fit but the actual part that sits on the ears is very small. These would be best for small children.  I had to return.

author: Pamela Chavez
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIncredible Sound, Noise Canceling & Battery Life!
body: These headphones have completely exceeded my expectations! The noise cancellation is outstanding , it blocks out background sounds even in busy places like cafés or public transport. I can finally enjoy music and podcasts without distractions. The volume is impressively loud and clear, with deep bass and crisp highs. Whether I'm listening to relaxing music or working out, the sound quality stays top notch. What I love the most is the battery life. I’ve been using them daily and only need to charge them once every few days , they easily last over 30 hours on a single charge. Plus, the fast-charging feature is a lifesaver when I’m in a hurry. They're also super comfortable and don’t cause ear fatigue, even after long use.

author: Ada
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsFell apart in a few days!
body: Came apart in a week of use! I just don't get it!

author: Everett Martin
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBeautiful sound quality
body: My favorite headphones! I take these to the gym all the type! They cancel the noise around me and immerse me in the world of YouTube music

author: Nicole Boggs
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsHard to use
body: Hard to turn off, took awhile to find where to charge, one of foam protectors fell off after a few uses

author: Belem Vara Alvarez

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBueno
body: Justo lo que pedí ,buen estado ,se escucha muy bien

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNoice cancelling
body: These are great. I purchased for a recent trip by plane. I could hear the entire podcast I was listening to without any engine noice interference. It was very easy to connect to my phone. I could easily wrap around my neck or store in my carry on.

body: Se escuchan super bien Estos audífonos JBL me encantaron. El sonido es nítido, con bajos profundos y bien definidos, perfectos para disfrutar música, películas o llamadas con excelente calidad. Aíslan bien el ruido exterior y tienen buen volumen sin distorsión.

title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot What I Expected

author: Gabriella hansen
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsExperience.
body: Okay so it works amazing. The mic I’m not sure, but people tell me I sound normal, but I sound like I far away. but the mic quality is AMAZING. It connects fast, just make sure your Bluetooth is on. The volume control is pretty loud, I love my headphones being loud. Next is the compatibility. So basically it’s good. It’s just that I HATE IT when the foam on the headphones fall off. So I decided to take a nail clipper, the little cleaning part I took it and started to fix it, but it will leave holes in the foam. The Compatibility is okay though.

author: Country Girl68
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood brand
body: Good sound. Wear these while working. Easily connected to Bluetooth.

author: J S
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsTerrible product, battery stopped working
body: Battery stopped working in under 60 days, cannot hold a charge. Very low quality product, do not buy!

author: Izipho zaGael

body: as expected. 2nd time purchase to replace and old one which fell on rough surface and broke

author: Jacqueline Nkwana
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLast long
body: This my second pair!! Love

author: Late
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBe aware
body: I did not buy from Amazon, but I wanted to write a review so that others may be aware. At first I immediately purchased because they were JBL’s and knew they would be great or so I thought. These lasted maybe two months if that. I only wore for an hour per day for workout sessions. Pros: sound quality was excellent! Which is why I bought to begin with. Cons: not a massive deal breaker, but the battery life was mediocre. I’ve had better. The cushion on the headphones fell off immediately and won’t stay on the originally when purchased. For the price point and JBL I’d expect better. The headphones seemed pretty cheap too. I did not have them long at all to enjoy any other features. HIGHLY disappointed with these headphones. The reason I purchased was because my headphones of 20 years the battery life lasted FOREVER and I do mean FOREVER!! The cushion fell off and the muffs were flaking off. I definitely miss the quality of those headphones and the longevity. Very very disappointed with these headphones. Now I will have to purchase new ones yet again. It put such a bad taste that I’ll never purchase JBL headphones ever again. And I really wanted to love these.

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAmazing for the PRice
body: Great headphones for the PRice

I am a podcast listener not music, Sounds good. Paired easily..They could really do a better job with their instructions.Without you tube I would have given up.

body: These headphones have clear sound and strong bass. They’re comfortable to wear for a long time and the battery lasts a lot. Perfect for music and calls!

author: Frederica Burrage
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsEasily Broken
body: I have not used these much. Maybe 4 times. Then the 5th time,  I had to charge them and noticed that they were broken. I didn't mishandle them. They laid on my headboard and they never fell.  They sounded okay, but not Good Quality in materials.

author: Arica
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat quality, decent price.
body: These cordless Bluetooth JBL headphones phones are great quality with decent volume control. They are also noise canceling. Super easy to set up and connect you your phone or Bluetooth devices. They do have buttons on the side to turn on the headphones and to change the music. I wear mine while cleaning the house, mowing the lawn and getting my steps in.

author: Leslie
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat and functional for kids!
body: These headphones have been wonderful for my nine-year-old son. We don’t have any issues with connectivity, and they are easy to use as well as or easy to set up. We have traveled considerably with them and they have held up to all of the wear and tear you could get in a little boy backpack. I would highly recommend these.

author: Sarah Shortt
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsBad fit
body: The sound quality is great. The bar across the top of the head is very uncomfortable.

author: Cúchulainn
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDrops connection, too small, sort of OK for the price.
body: The good: the sound quality is decent enough and the price is low. The bad: they're too small and are uncomfortable even when fully extended. Perhaps worse, they lose connection with some regularity. I have these paired with a laptop, and almost once a day the connection will fail and then cannot be reestablished without completely restarting the laptop--not the headphones, the laptop. Trying to reconnect, restart, or even factory reset the headphones doesn't help. If you are ok with semi-functional headphones and want to pay as little as you can get away with, these are workable. If you want anything convenient and of solid quality, seek higher ground.

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood

author: Angel

body: I use these headphones everyday! They are comfy and connects to Bluetooth easily. I charge them at the beginning of the week and they still have battery remaining at the end of the week

author: Stephanie Rivera
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBattery life sucks
body: I got my a month ago and haven’t been using them much like I thought I would. When I go to try to use them the battery is drained. Again, I hardly use and I charge them when I attempt to use them and notice the battery is drained. If I don’t use them much, shouldn’t it still be charged the next time I try to use them? When I have used them, it’s literally been around 10 minutes. I was going to return them but my return window has closed. Do not recommend.

author: Zamora Bradshaw
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest headphones I’ve ever had
body: These work so good, they connect very fast and the battery life is so long! These are easy to fold up and put in any bag, super comfortable, and the noise cancelation is chefs kiss. Setup is amazing

author: David O
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsOn sale often and amazing for the price.
body: I remember needing a new pair and checking on these so often thinking the sale would go away. They're always half off and sound amazing. On top of the that the battery last so long on both the case and the ear buds, I still don't know what the low battery indicator is because I've never had an issue with it. Perfect ear buds for the price.

author: Rachael Schwartz
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks well
body: These earbuds are easy to use. The sound is great. The caller in the other end can hear the background sounds and that can be a distraction but they can still hear you very well. I'm definitely satisfied with this purchase

author: Dantesia Stovall
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGood but fell apart
body: The product is nice and loud. Very much noise canceling. But the right earbud began to fall apart. Like the entire front side detached from the back side.

author: solange herrera

author: AK
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPhenomenal product
body: To my surprise these earbuds are phenomenal!  I bought them during the prime deal days sale and based off of the good reviews, hoping for a decent, spare pair.  From the moment they played in my ears, I knew I was hooked. I don’t care for a lot of bass, instead I prefer clarity and crisp sound.  I get every bit of that with these buds.  I use them for mowing for hours and these give me quality sound that cuts through the noise of the mower.  They pair up to my iphone the second I take them out of their case and have excellent volume range and battery life.  IMO these are better than my Apple, Bose, and JBL buds, that I spent a heck of a lot more money on.  I will buy a few more pairs for work, play, and gifts.  No more expensive brands for me!

author: Michael Madden
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product at great price with important caveats
body: 5/5 for being a good product at a phenomenal price. I had Apple AirPods Pro that I got back in 2020, and they finally bit the dust early this year. In anticipation of potential AirPods Pro Max 2 release this upcoming fall, I did not want to shell out a lot of money on new AirPods, so I bought these. These do have their quirks (below). Honestly, though, these are such a good product that I may hold off on buying the new AirPods release until the buying public have beta tested the new release, and new release pricing has attenuated. Great price: I paid around $20, which is current discounted pricing from what I'm seeing Very good battery life: I've sometimes gone weeks without charging these, but usually during light usage; more often I'm charging them every handful of days. They also charge very fast, like less than an hour to get to full charge on the earbuds and case. Easy to pair: Self-explanatory. Does not automatically connect audio/microphone on inbound call (outbound call is automatically connected): When I'm listening to music and I answer an inbound call, these will not automatically connect audio and microphone--I need to go to the audio/microphone button on the phone screen to get the call onto that. It's not major, but it is an annoyance to answer a call and be like, "One second [clicks button]...can you hear me now?" When I have these connected and I make an outbound call, there is no interruption of connection. (Maybe I'm not changing some setting in iPhone, but I've not been able to find the culprit) Slightly odd shape, may fall out of ears easily: I have weirdly shaped ears, and any wireless earbuds often fall out of my ears. However, these really fall out of my left ear with simple things like talking on the phone. Case is very cheaply made: The case feels so light and plastic. Yes, I know that AirPods cases are also plastic, but this should have been made to be smaller and more solid, it feels flimsy. I really doubt that making this a little better would destroy the seller's profit margin, but maybe it would have. I also do not like the little strap that they provide, which one could use to attach to the outside of a bag or some such. I feel like the case might open if it were hanging off a bag and got knocked against something. I removed the little strap and only put the case inside my bag or pocket. No noise cancellation: As I said, these are a bridge to get me through to the new AirPods release and I would not expect noise cancellation at such a good price point. The Amazon AI summary said people rave about the noise cancellation, idk who is saying that, it's not true.

They are a little bit slower to connect occasionally, but I think that's more due to my phone itself rather than the earbuds. I have dropped them many a time but they still work great, albeit with some dings and scratches. Overall, I would say these are for sure worth more than 20$. (Which was the price when I bought it)

author: Oneil Knight
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDecent Sound, But Poor Durability — Go for the Life P3i Instead
body: I had the Soundcore P20i before upgrading to the Life P3i, and honestly, the difference is night and day. The P20i started off okay — decent sound for the price — but they didn’t last long. The build quality just isn’t there. Mine gave out pretty fast with normal, everyday use. Compared to the Life P3i, it’s not even close. If you’re choosing between the two, spend a little extra and go with the Life P3i. It’s way more durable, has better features, and will actually last. P20i might work for super light use, but if you’re using earbuds daily — look elsewhere.

author: Drew Lincoln
title: 3.0 out of 5 stars15 months to end of life
body: Purchased these headphones on May 21st 2024. As of two weeks ago they no longer work. They will not charge, regardless of the charging block or cable. To add, they’ve never been dropped. Called the Sony service and they confirmed based off cable and hard reset that something isn’t working. Referred to Sony encompass repair since the Amazon warranty is only a year from date to purchase. It’s $40 + shipping to run a diagnostic. Then repairs can range from $50 to $100+ depending on what needs repaired, etc., and you also pay for shipping lol. At that point, I’m almost paying 3/4 the price of the headphones. If you buy these, I’d recommend the additional warranty.

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIf you buy this device (from Amazon), you can pair these to your PS5 w/o any issues.
body: I took a chance and bought these for strictly gaming on my PS5, and they work perfectly if you buy this device from amazon for about $25 (UGREEN USB-C Bluetooth Adapter for PS5, Bluetooth 5.3 Audio Adapter with APTX Low Latency & aptX-Adaptive, Wireless Audio Transmitter to Connect Wireless Headphones & Earbuds). You need to install this device in the fast port on the PS5 and then you can connect these headphones and there is absolutely no latency, and the sound is perfect!! I don't need to use these for music or cell phone calls.

title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat! Unless you have a small head.
body: I've heard great things about this headset. The sound quality is great. Loved the features...but there was one issue I had. It was to big. I used them for working out. And they would start sliding off. Couldn't do sit ups without then sliding off my ears and then just hanging onto my pony tail. Good product. My heads just wasn't big enough I guess.

author: J. Edwards
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsRead my review
body: This item was advertised at 52% during prime day. This proved to be false so I returned it. Also, the instructions were very poor presented in several languages so small that we could not read them with the magnifying glass will pass on this item.

author: Peter Walsh
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDoesnt
body: Battery doesn’t charge but still good quality

author: Jake S.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSony Headphones are the bomb thank you sony.
body: So far, these are the best pair of headphones I have ever owned. I used to have Airpods, and those were a bit of a pain because of the fit in my ears. They always fell out and were uncomfortable. I eventually replaced them with the insanely bass boosted skullcandys. Those were fine, and I was pretty happy. Then my gaming headphones, the HyperX cloluds started to peel. I didn't want to get gaming headphones because I already have a microphone and don't want it to look gamey. I heard these headphones have a feature where you can connect to 2 devices and switch between them. So I bought them for my computer. Now, I can play games, and when I need to drop the kids off at the super bowl, I can do so without removing the headphones from my head, and can watch TIkToks comfortably on my phone. The audio swaps over no problemo. The audio quality is great, the ambient sound mode can be used to hear more than my hearing can hear, and when i want people to stop talking, the noise cancelling works well enough to prompt me to say yes to non-questions. The battery has lasted a while without needing a charge, and it is USB when it does need a charge. They are lightweight and sit well on my big head. The buttons are kind of funky, as most of the controls are with gestures that sometimes don't want to play well. I will say the app is terrible, the software is funky, and the features where it detects if you want ambient sound just doesn't work well. If you want $500 quality headphones but don't want to spend that much money, I believe this is the best choice. And for me they work as a two in one, so it really is like a $250 pair, but twice.

author: Dee C
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest Headphone Decision!
body: I am not a self-proclaimed audiophile, so my review is for simple folk like me. I was torn between the Apple AirPods Max and the Sony XM4, and I am so happy I went with the XM4 instead! These headphones are pretty lightweight which allows me to wear the headphones for hours without it feeling heavy on my head. They are also the perfect size for over-the-ear, so there is no discomfort of the headphones pressing against my head that on-ear headphones have. The noise-cancelling on these is excellent, I can work from home in peace or do work in public without disturbances. Battery life is also great and you won't have to charge these super often. Audio quality is the best I've had in an audio device. It's crisp and clear, my music sounds amazing and I get to experience it in a high-quality way I haven't before. Sounds significantly better than my Beats Solo 3. Also a HUGE upgrade and spectacular from regular AirPods. There is a Sony Connect app you can download to further customize your headphones (e.g. fine tune equalizers, fine tune the noise cancelling), but these also work straight out the box if you prefer to not download the app. The headphones have a power button and a "custom" button with some helpful shortcuts; you can press the custom button to turn on/off noise cancelling and turn on/off adaptive ambient noise. You can also press the power button to hear how much battery the headphones have left. I have an iPhone, iPad and Windows laptop- this doesn't clash at all with my Apple ecosystem and was also easy to pair to my Windows laptop! Overall, definetely my favorite choice I've made for headphones.

author: Zoran Pecic
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAll as expected and headphones works well
body: All as expected!

author: Carlos
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLa mejor compra
body: Espectacular 👌

author: Francisco Javier Russo Marco
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNo lo dudes. Es excelente
body: Excelente producto muy recomendable. El sonido es increible. Probe 4 primeras marcas y me quedo con este sin dudarlo.Precio y calidad

author: Nani
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsWanted to love these, but no…
body: Ugh I wanted to love these so bad, but no. I previously had Beats Solo headphones for YEARS that still work but they are falling apart, so I did my research and saw these were highly favored. But, the sound quality just isn’t there. Sounds like the music if coming out of cheap plastic headphones, not a pair that’s almost $300. The sound is flat and not full enough for my liking. And the touch feature is a bit too sensitive, especially when I’m in the gym and my arms go over my head and lightly touch the headphones. The speak-to-chat feature is annoying and pauses my music when nothing was even said. They are comfortable, the noise-canceling is good, and I like the app features, but these are definitely getting returned.

author: Macon
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExpensive but worth it
body: Fits nicely,colors is good for all outfits.ears stay comfortable for a long time before getting sore.pretty durable and solid build going for them.expensive but worth it.connects to everything pretty easily bluetooth or auxilary cord.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat if you have tinnitus
body: I was  referred these for tinnitus while talking on the phone. I can hear the other person much better. Love them ❤️

author: Kindle Customer
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsTerrible durability…
body: It’s really sad that I have to write this review but here goes- I actually love these headphones dearly- the sound quality and noise cancelling is by far the best I’ve ever experienced and the comfort of the headphones is phenomenal. With that being said, there’s a terrible issue with the way it’s made that results in it breaking after a while in one particular area (the bit that makes the ear rotate breaks causing it to dangle). The first time it happened (less than a year after getting it) I thought it was just that pair. I ended up getting a second pair and lo and behold- another year later it broke in the same exact spot. I took it to get fixed which was quite expensive and hey- again, a year later (today) it broke again in the SAME spot. I really don’t know what to do at this point because as I said, they’re my favorite headphones in existence, it’s just that I hate to spend so much money on them for them to only last a year.

author: Artless
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery pleasantly surprised! Great for focusing on work w/o completely shutting out your surroundings.
body: I never used noise cancelling headphones before, but I work from home, and the outside noise this summer is too distracting. I was going nuts! These are perfect for me to focus while working at my desk. I put on a light, nature ambiance video from YouTube and the world is blocked out enough for me to focus. They also work great without any audio - just noise blocking. I can still hear a very light noise from the fan or my dogs which is what I prefer; I don't want to be completely shut off from my surroundings - just not driven to distraction. Phone calls come through fine from my mobile - clear sound. I should have bought these long ago for my own peace & sanity. I haven't read the instructions to figure out the touch controls on the headset yet, but I have accidentally bumped it and shut off the volume. Better read up on that function. So far I've controlled everything from my mobile phone. They are comfortable on my ears and don't interfere with my blue-blocker glasses or earrings. They also don't snag my long hair. The only concern is the longevity of the pad around the ear. It is a very soft & light material. It feels great so I hope it lasts. I'll just be careful with it. Color:  I ordered the midnight blue. Well - they are almost black. I cannot tell they are not black. In fact when they arrived, I forgot that I ordered blue until the next day when the sunlight caught the hard case and showed a bit lighter shade. So if you really like blue, these may disappoint. It's not a deal-breaker for me. I just get tired of everything being black and wanted some color. But they look black anyway.  :/ Case:  a big plus! I wasn't really considering the case when I purchased these since they'll rarely leave my desk. But if I were still doing a lot of air travel, I would be very grateful for this hard case. Zipper works smooth; there's a little loop on the outside to hang/clip the case and a mesh pocket. The inside is compartmentalized efficiently with the cord also. Great packaging, Sony! I've only used these cordless, so I can't comment on the included cord. Charging: the headset has a plug for apple chargers and another for regular C chargers. I have android and was stumped for few seconds when I couldn't connect my charging cord. (oops)  Just another reminder for me why I do not buy anything apple. These are excellent in my opinion. Pricey, but they should last me a long time and will help me get my work done without all of the distractions. I bought these on a July prime deal for $193. I would never have tried them at regular price, but I have to say they are worth the value if you have that budget. Highly recommended!

author: Sven
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNice bro
body: I am so glad I got these?? Yes! I come from the in ear airpods which I hate and I think gave me EDT...is there a class action suit against them regarding that btw?? These are fun and have great sound and noise cancelling really nice. The one issue I have is if I bend over while doing something as I often do while painting they can come loose. And I don't want them too tight for starters . whatever not a big deal anyway I love them..so much so that I felt compelled to come on and review here. Bye

author: Henry Welsby
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat quality of sound
body: Best headphones I’ve ever purchased

author: Brooke Baker
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsgreat purchase!
body: husband loves them

author: Joely Rosenberg
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsSound leaks and speak to chat is terrible
body: -Leaks sound even on low volume -speak to chat turns it’s self back on after i turn it off in the app, so everytime I make a sound wearing the headphones ambient sound is activated.

author: Len C
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWorst headphones Sony has ever made!
body: Really disappointed in Sony. These are the worst headphones I have ever purchased. The sound cuts out CONSTANTLY and disconnects from my PC all the time. I’ve tried adjusting the settings and trying to find solutions online to no avail. So glad to be returning them and getting them out of here.

author: Mario Cerna
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound!!
body: Great sound, great quality, it is well recommended.

author: cath
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLifechanging
body: I’ve been internally debating whether to get this headphone for the longest time (about 3 years). I finally got it, and I wish I had purchased this earlier! I am very sensitive to noise and my surrounding that I get easily distracted. The noise cancelling on this headphone is so great. I used this headphone at the library and was able to focus for 2-3 hours straight. Sound is also great! Looking forward to using this daily.

author: Dalia
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect for music, work, and travel 🎧
body: I love these headphones! The sound is super clear with great bass, and the noise canceling is amazing. When I wear them, I barely hear anything around me — perfect for focusing or relaxing. They’re also really comfortable. I can wear them for hours without any pain. The battery lasts a long time, and I love that I can connect them to two devices at once. They’re a bit pricey, but honestly worth every dollar. If you’re looking for high-quality headphones, I totally recommend them!

author: Sofía Fuentes
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSooo in love
body: They have a really good battery life and connect perfectly to my iPhone. What surprised me the most was the large range of connectivity. Good price and quality.

author: Dave
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsGarbage
body: I have the earbuds and a cheaper version of these. These are absolute garbage. They have trouble connecting constantly. They can't stay on, they get confused constantly at what they're supposed to do, the haptic controls are garbage. I finally had it and tossed them away. The cheaper $60 ones are far superior, instantly connect, are lighter, and last for hours!

author: Empress
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNice
body: The media could not be loaded. Love it

author: David Roland
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsI am super particular about my headphones. Good if you have small ears.
body: Great sound, Sony always has strong bass, so if you like that trap sht or metal, you’ll bump in these. But, reviews RAVE about the noise cancelling, and for me, it was really bad - I think for two reasons: 1) I’m used to these https://amzn.to/3IEqeah (Bose 700) - they are amazing in terms of noise cancelling. 2) the earmuffs don’t cover the ears (my big*ss ears At least) so there isn’t a seal. It’s a press, which isn’t good and it leads to pain after about a half hour. So pros, I like the look, they are also super light which is sweet, and the bass is INSANE if you crank it in the settings. Cons: if you have big ears and really value noise canceling, get the bose 700

author: David Tierno
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery good price and fast shipping!
body: Great competitive price, I bought the mx4’s this Monday and got them 3 days later. Came in great condition. I’m very pleased!

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood headphones
body: Good headphones and the battery life is great

author: Timothy Dang
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGreat* Headphones - (*if you have small ears)
body: I really, really wanted to like these headphones. I saw a great comparison video of these against the more recent XM6s from Rtings and they stacked up pretty well. There was also a flash discount on the price so I jumped on them. However, the noise cancelling microphones that live in the ear cups rub against my ears. Rtings say the same thing: “However, they are shallower in profile than the Bose QuietComfort 45/QC45 Wireless, which can present discomfort if you have larger ears, as your ears may rub against the driver housing.” I just can’t wear them for any length of time without pain. ANC is pretty awesome. The build quality is nice, and the companion app was pretty decent. If I had smaller ears, I would be totally enjoying these.

author: Matt Richard
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood headphones
body: Comfortable, sound quality is very good. Can listen for hours upon hours on a single charge. Fits comfortably over my head and hat.

author: Natasha

body: I love it ! Soooooo awesome !

author: Katherine

body: These are so comfortable, the battery life is great, and had great quality sound. I have yet to get a pair of Sony headphones I didn’t like. My only, extremely small complaint is that the touch controls are a little different from my other pairs.
