title: 1.0 out of 5 starsEar Cups Uncomfortable
body: The ear cups on this product are uncomfortable - was only able have on ears for 30 min.  Comparing these to Bose and Beats they are behind the curve.

author: Herenya86
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsHorrible sound quality
body: Horrid! I am angry that anyone dare charge anything over $10 for this! The only thing it does is cancel noise, but I wanted headphones and the quality is that of cheap earbuds from a gas station!  I don’t understand all these high praises because of Amazon this isn’t getting good reviews!

author: Jackie
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcelente sonido
body: Excelente sonido, el mejor aislamiento de sonido!👌🏼

author: JC
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsUnusable for phone calls, but great sound.
body: Do not buy this headset if your are expecting to be able to use it for calls or to talk to folks.  You cannot install the app on a desktop computer and have to jump through hoops to make it work if you can at all.  On the phone they do sound very good, but do not think for a second you can get on a 10 minute call without the folks on the other side saying they cannot hear you..  Absolute Waste of Money..

author: Natalia
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood so far!
body: Have had this for about a week now, so far so good! Love the options to just tap/slide on the right side headbud to lower/raise music or to pause and skip. Also love the options it has to stop playing when you start talking to someone. Used it for the gym as well and no issues there. Deducted a star because it claims to have 30 hours of use, however it only lasted me 2-3 days (for a total of like 5-6 hours max). Not sure if they didn’t come fully charged, will see how long they last me this time around. Overall though, I got it for prime day and definitely worth the money, given the deal they were giving at the time.

author: Aundria
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe best headphones
body: Love love love. I live to wear them at the gym because of the noise canceling. I would recommend getting covers for the headphones. They’re just rubber covers for the ear area and the top bar of the headphones. It will help them last longer. I also wear them at work when I don’t want anyone talking to me because I can’t hear them. If you get distracted easily and just need to be in your own zone, these headphones can do that for ya :)

author: Wade
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNot for fitness!
body: These are not good for the gym! They do not stay on your head very well they fall off a lot. And I have a very big head. They also do not get as loud as I would like.

author: Tity
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe Best Headphones
body: A colleague enthusiastically recommended these to me, and since everyone around me seemed to be raving about them, I decided to give them a try. Let me tell you, they are fantastic! At first, the price tag seemed a bit steep, but after using them for about a year, they have become indispensable in my daily life. The battery life is remarkably long-lasting, allowing me to enjoy hours of uninterrupted listening. The Bluetooth setup was effortless, making the initial connection a breeze. They fit snugly and comfortably, providing a secure hold, yet they are surprisingly durable and can withstand daily wear and tear. However, I have noticed that wearing them for extended periods can sometimes lead to a touch of nausea, which is unfortunate. Additionally, they have a quirky tendency to automatically revert to noise-canceling mode, regardless of the settings I choose. However, despite these minor issues, the audio quality is stellar and crystal clear, with deep, rich sound that truly enhances my listening experience.

author: Elizabeth
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsperfect for smaller heads!
body: The media could not be loaded. in love with the headphones! i have a smaller head and they fit perfectly!! they are so comfortable on my ears! and sound amazing so far! the noise canceling is amazing, i have a toddler and she is in the needing to have the tv on 24/7 even if she’s not watching it has to be her cartoons so these are amazing to listen to my audiobooks with since it complete blocks out the background noise (i can still hear her just not the lower tv noises!) I love that i can turn the noise canceling on and off if i need to be more aware! it’s very nice that they came with a heavier duty case plus all the cords needed! i will be honest though im not sure i would’ve purchased these if they hadn’t been half off, im not sure any headphones are worth over $300😅 i will update the review after i few months of use to comment on durability/battery!!

author: Tina
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest Option
body: These are AWESOME. Sound quality is great and they are so comfortable. I was worried they might feel kinda cheap but they don’t. Glad I went with these over the xm5s.

author: Tony
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsTt LA
body: Hard to get use to the touch sensors on ear pad, easy bump or swipe can cause sensor to make an action.  Sound and fit is good, no concerns. Still getting use to touch sensors on ear pad.

author: saad sharief
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsNot new
body: Leather had tears and it’d been used a lot already when I got it.

author: Mary Saulle
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsOne of the worst headsets ive tried yet.
body: Absolutely abysmal max volume. No matter if all the audio levels are at max across all apps, these only get as loud as you expect a headset to be at 50%. Bluetooth cuts out less than a foot away. Very cheap earpads. Flimsy and feels like it will break if you even look at it funny. Do yourself a favor and look at another option if you want to use these wireless on pc. I expected some latency not drop outs every 2 seconds with abysmal volume.

author: Angel
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsAvoid
body: Not sure if these are authentic or not.  when you have the headphones on people around you could hear the music  as if it were on a television or something.

author: HiFiScienceAudio&Tech
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Reliability and Sound Quality
body: great sound quality - I really enjoyed my XM2s, and I find this isn't quite as good for ANC or comfort, but it was purchased on sale as a backup for a great price. Meanwhile my XM2s are still going strong after 8 years.

author: Michael D
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsSubpar audio/great ANC
body: I’m not an audiophile by any means, but it is pretty easy for me to tell when something sounds good and this unfortunately does not have a high quality sound. Everything just sounds very muddy and unclear, and I tried to messing around with the EQ a lot and it helps a little but it still just isn’t great. I think the Bass is too powerful (even after lowering it with the EQ) so it may be good for rap and pop but besides that it’s not an enjoyable listening experience. As for the ANC, it’s incredible and I’m sure would be great on planes, trains etc. but it wasn’t really my main purpose for buying over ear headphones. I just expected more from these especially with all the reviews, but they just don’t sound all that great.

author: Moyinoluwa
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsMeh
body: Sound quality is not worth the price. Sounds muffled and bad. Great noise canceling tho.

author: Cliente de Kindle
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBeautiful quality 🤌🏽
body: Best headphones ever made!! Love them so much, and haven’t taken them off since I received them. 100/10 recommend.

author: Mikhail Shtrenitcer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound
body: Very light, very soft, a lot of adjustments and settings. Adjustable noise cancelation.  Easy to use. Sony holds its name.

author: Jalen White
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAlmost perfect
body: As far as looks go, the design of these I prefer much more over my beats EXCEPT for the bulkiness. The sound is immaculate. The noise cancellation is a lot better than my beats. The carry case is a lot better. Now I’m selling my beats.

author: Brandon Gooley
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound and noise cancelling!
body: The Sony WH-1000XM4 headphones are incredible. The noise cancellation blocks everything out, and the sound is crisp with deep bass. Super comfy for long use, great battery life, and the touch controls work well. Got these for a great deal during Prime Days!

author: Yaritza
title: 5.0 out of 5 stars10/10
body: Has a lot of great features. For the same price of beats headphones and the beats dont do anything but connect to your device. The Sony headphones can even detect when YOU speak while listening to music and it pauses the music. It can detect your surroundings. It has gps so that it can switch on how you hear things depending where you at..etc. its well worth the money

author: Edina
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAmazing! Can’t go wrong.
body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: Amazing sound! Regardless of the age, this headphone is a beast compared to my JBL. Crispy and clear sound. Heaven in my ears. You even have the option of changing the equalizer to your liking. My daughter had it when it first came out and now in 2025, still working with no problems. I had to buy one for myself. I highly recommend. Durability: 100%

author: Rebecca
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAmazing quality
body: Definitely worth it and got it on sale!!! Love love love them :)

author: K
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsValue for money
body: Comfortable, good sound. All in all good headphones.

author: Kimberly Fujioka
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsThese headphones stopped working about 30 days after my purchased. Total waste of money.
body: After about 30 days or so the noise canceling function stopped working. I was very careful with them. I on,y used them a handful of times. A total waste of money. These are expensive too! Never again.

author: GoBoSox
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound. Flawed design. Replaced.
body: Great ANC. Very customizable sound and good low extension. Uses USB C to charge so that’s a positive. Long lasting battery time. However as many have noted the drivers on both sides stick out  in the cups so shortly after I put them on they are way too painful to wear. A combo of bad design and very flimsy ear pads. Long-haul flight?  Forget it. No excuse at this price point. Just went back to Bose despite a problem with their on/off switches in the past. Bose isn’t perfect but has no such comfort issues.

author: Thomas C
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWorst headphones ever
body: Easily the worst headphones I've ever used. I wouldn't pay $50 for this piece of garage. Music sounds extremely muddy and tinny. Absolutely loved the 5s, lost those and got these since it was on sale. Huge mistake. I can't come up with enough words to describe how awful these headphones are. DO NOT BUY!

author: Kay Lyn
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAMAZING, and especially great for gaming
body: Have had these for years now, best headphones I've ever owned. You will not hear ANYTHING going on outside the headphones, the noise cancelling is unbelievable. And the sound quality is amazing, for music and for gaming. It's literally a joke in my gaming group that I have supersonic hearing (despite actually having not the best hearing ironically) bc when we play FPS I can practically hear another player drop a gun from across the map, it's insane. Love these headphones.

author: Derys
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsUn exito
body: Se los compre a mi hija que tiene autismo y le fascina porque tiene cancelación de ruido. Súper recomendable. Para niños con auriculares es un éxito. Me lo van a agradecer si lo adquieren.

author: TechTarHeel
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNo USB Audio pass-through
body: No USB Audio pass-through.  I bought these to watch movies with noise cancellation on long flights.  There is NO USB audio pass-through.  In other words, if you plug in the headphones to the USB outlet on an airplane entertainment seat back, the ANC turns off while charging.

author: Candace
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNice, But Not Worth the Price
body: I use my headphones during the day for work and when doing chores around the house. I own a pair of Beats and a pair of Sony WH-CH250s ($75), which I got for $30 on sale. Ultimately, the XM4's are nice, but they lack key functionality. The Good: These are light weight without feeling cheap. They come with a nice case that includes a space for all of the accessories. They came partially charged, so you can use them right out of the box. They do not hurt my small ears, and I can wear them all day if I need to with no pain, and very little ear sweating. The sound is what I would expect from Sony, and the noise cancelling feature is nice. It does connect seamlessly with the Sony Connect app. The Acceptable: Due to the noise cancelling, these headphones have middling battery life. It says 30 hours, but they stated low battery after two days of use. The less expensive CH250s can go much longer without that warning. They also have a feature that automatically turns off when removed from the head and auto-off when set down. Sometimes I would like to leave them on and connected, but I can see why this feature is desirable for most. The Bad: I, even with my small hands and fingers, cannot turn up or down the volume without pausing or ending a call.  The CH250s have physical buttons, but these do not. I cannot for the life of me understand how upgrading a device results in a worse user experience. The feature to change songs suffers from the same issue. It is pretty awful design. I know that sleekness is valued, but functionality should not be secondary to ease of use. The other issue is the playback. I ordered these headphones because one of the issues with the CH250s is that you often have to go to the app to switch playback to devices, even overnight. This problem is particularly annoying when the headphones are paired with a phone. They frequently switch back to the phone, even when using another device. I hoped the upgrade would fix this problem, but it remained. After two days, I am returning these headphones because the lack of physical buttons for volume is beyond annoying and makes them borderline unusable for me. The frequent use of the app to fix the playback to the device remains a minor but annoying problem. I got them on sale for $184, and they are not worth it, and they are certainly not worth $300 when not on sale. I ordered the Bose QuietComfort for $10 more; they have buttons!

author: Brock P.
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsConsider Alternatives highly recommended
body: bought these a few years ago and they worked fine until the pressure is disturbed (for instance flying). this also happens if your ears get sweaty.  Then this deafening hum starts then a beeping noise that will cause hearing damage. In this day and age of no contact customer service I could never get through or even find a way through Sony to reach someone to report the issue. They have connectivity issues and are terrible for phone calls. In addition, they are too loose and fall off if you bend over. I would not buy these again and just purchase Bose to replace them so I will be writing a review after the new pair arrives, and I have a chance to compare them.

author: Tom Prange
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWay to expensive
body: The noise canceling works ok except for a weird crackling notice they make. They are super bulky and sit really weird on your head.

author: Erin78
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe best
body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: I love these headphones, they are very noise canceling which is great when I want to watch my shows while my husband plays drums. To me they sound better than my daughters apple over ear headphones!! Definitely recommend!!

author: Ben Chen
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsHigh Quality
body: The ear pads are soft and feels great. Good quality audio and noise cancelation.

author: THJester
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest all-around over-the-ear headphones
body: I've tried a wide variety of over the ear headphones and for years preferred Bose (especially the Quiet Comfort), but these are currently the best combination of sound quality, noise cancellation, and comfort.

author: Therese Russell
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsHorrible ANC crackling sound
body: Had horrible static when using the ANC feature. It was to the point where I could not use the headphones any more. I had these headphones for less than a week. Less than 5 hours were put on them. Bought them as new, but will not be buying Sony again.

author: rp
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMust by if you like music!!
body: I love everything about it it’s on my head literally the whole day the battery life is  exceptional the sound quality is crisp clear with a excellent punchy bass I wish the noise cancellation would be this good well I’d give it a 3 star it’s comfortable and I love the touch controls it’s smooth sleek thank you so much Sony really recommend!!!

author: NayNay
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsComfortable and Good Sound
body: Purchased these and have been enjoying them. Especially, the noise cancellation feature. I got the used/good condition earphones at a low price which made me very happy with my purchase. As some of the other reviewers mentioned the sound quality is very good and very comfortable on the ears.

author: Eric Monroy
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest decision I made
body: My first pair of headphones And after trying these I couldnt go back to using just any earbuds or headphones They set a bar if you arent familiar with any headphones I recommend these to anyone whos looking for a good pair thats not crazy expensive like the rest of the market These are still as good as my xm5 sometimes I feel like, the noise cancellation is the only difference ive noticed between both pairs! Great battery as well can last you a day or two with constant use and no charge from my memory

author: Alexsis Lambert
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsExceptional noise canceling
body: Sound is good, not great.  Noise canceling is stellar.  I use them while mowing the yard and the mower does not drown out the music!

author: Michelle McClellan
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorth every penny
body: I have had these headphones for almost 4 years. I love them. I plan to purchase another pair for my daughter. The noise cancelling feature works great. I love that they connect to my phone without a hiccup. The battery lasts for weeks! I love that I can hover over my right ear and the noise stops and I can hear the person talking to me. They fit my head well. They have been worth every penny. I recommend these headphones.

author: Elyse Johnson
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Buy
body: I love love love these headphones. I bought november 2022, i am an avid music listener and often forget to charge them and they last like all week. If i go months without using them, it’s still charged. They sound brand new and it’s been almost 3 full years. The connectivity is easy to work with, it automatically connects to both my ipad and my phone as soon as i cut it on.

author: Anne
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Indoor Headphones
body: My boyfriend has a pair of these headphones and after countless times of me accidentally stepping on them (and they never broke) it encouraged me to get my own. They are durable with great sound quality, and a long lasting battery. However, they are best for indoor use. They are a little loose on my head and if I were to run in them they'd fall off. Otherwise great for watching movies and listening to music while cooking! Noise cancellation works great, no headaches.

author: Peter M
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEpic
body: These are epic headphones. Bought “like new” and can’t be happier.

author: David Schreiber
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBetter than expected
body: I purchased this as a headset for online meetings because reviews said it was comfortable. It's VERY comfortable, and I can wear these for hours. Sound quality is near audiophile level; excellent bass, midrange, and treble, so I'm using it for music, too. The noise canceling is next level, to the point where I can be in silence while demolition is going on next door. My next door neighbor can be noisy at times so I just put these on and the noise disappears, I don't even need to play music: it is silent!

author: Amazon Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDead on arrival
body: Audio jack only works if you shove the cable in. I bought this to replace my old XM4s, and the same cable that worked with those doesn't work with these. Disappointing to say the least

author: Ryan Z
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGreat for listening and ANC
body: This is a solid headphone for watching or listening to music or for it's noise cancelling feature, it's great, but the software is not optimized, they keep disconnecting on me, turning off, and the mic sometimes works sometimes they can only hear mumbling.

author: Itz a Family Thing
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBroke in 4 month
body: Broke 4 months after purchase and Sony says oh well. These headphones are very expensive but the material seems to be cheaper and cheaper. I used them mostly for work meetings and casual use around the house. My ear buds are my go to for daily use but these were great for traveling.

author: HUAZKAR
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAUDIO EN ALTA DEFINICION EN MIS OIDOS
body: LLevo 3 años con esta maravilla de auriculares y lo uso en casa, en el trabajo, en la playa, en la calle, no niego que existan mejores auriculares por distintas caracteristicas y marcas, pero estoy muy contento y satisfecho con el Sony WH-1000XM4, sobre todo cuando los uso con cancelación de ruido, es sencillamente espectacular, núnca hago revisión de un producto al poco tiempo de haberlo comprado, siempre espero unos meses y hasta años, sobre todo en técnologia, el primer año los use exclusivamente con mi reporductor personal de música, pero de pronto se me ocurrio ver televisión una noche un poco tarde, simplemente lo conecte al televisor y vi un par de peliculas de acción ... quede asombrado escuchando el mas mínimo detalle de los sonidos de las peliculas. Espectacular !

author: Kathy
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsLight weight, good sound
body: Second pair, I love these. My last pair was lost. I tried some others and they were not good. My only complaint is they don’t keep a charge as long as my original pair.

author: kerri
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLoveeeeee them
body: Extremely comfortable

author: K.Fisher
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWaste of money
body: I use to love these but within a month of buying them, they stopped charging/stopped working. This is the 2nd time this has happened. Never buying these again

author: Tony
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks as expected
body: Works as expected

author: deltadude65
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDid not meet the quality I expected
body: This is my 4th pair of these. The first three were great......this one sounds very bad. So maybe there's a 75% chance of getting a good one

author: Kruppsd
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsMic stopped working
body: Microphone stopped working after 2 months

author: Gagrl
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat price Amazing product 10 🌟
body: great price & literally one of the best purchases from Amazon , got this for my teenage son for Christmas of 2024 and I can't tell you enough on how much he loves them . They are definitely noise canceling and holds charge Very well .. A must buy if you're looking for an excellent  set of buds ..hands down

author: Raef Chenery
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsStopped working after a year
body: Stopped working after one year - won’t turn on or charge

author: Anne Griesinger
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsConstantly breaking
body: My husband and I keep buying these from Amazon and they keep breaking. The first pair I bought years ago lasted forever and now I feel like they’re being made incredibly cheaply they do not last. I’ve had three pair break in the last year or two.

author: Clint
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsJunk
body: Bought 2 of these, my wife’s and mine both quit working 5 months later.

author: Kenneth L Ware
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsNot good for music- no bass
body: They function fine if you want to use them for calls but for music the sounds sucks - no bass at all. My Tozo T6 were WAY better.

author: David Torres
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery durable with good sound quality
body: A quality product, the sound quality is nice, I have used it for over 3 months and they are still as good as the first day. Having a magnet on the headphones makes it easier to use while working or outside. They are comfortable and quality, the ear cushions come different for your comfort. Recommended if you are looking for comfortable headphones that won't get lost where you left them

author: Dain Bramage
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBuy them you won’t regret it
body: Great earphones good bass

author: Yalta Godoy
title: 5.0 out of 5 stars????
body: Very durable, great sound.  It surprised me.  I still use it.

author: Karen pulido
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSuper contenta con mis audifonos
body: Me encantan eh tenido varios de diferentes marcas y sinceramente ha sido el que mas me gusta es la segunda vez q compro unos.

author: Vijaya Vallurupalli
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsQuality
body: Good sound Comfortable fit

author: SandRose
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDecent purchase if you prefer buds over pods.
body: Wouldve gave 5 Stars, but this set feels a bit lighter than my previous. It connects well, but durability is about a 3.5 stars, the strands are a bit too long and thin, especially when wearing everyday. Also, it would be nice to have other fleshtone color options, since its something ppl wear daily and not have a bright color clashing with an outfit.

author: Luke
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsI'm an expert: these are the best!
body: Best earbuds bar none! I have had many through the years and this model is by far the best: great sound, holds charge long time, good range, comfortable, etc......

author: Josh Johnson
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNo good
body: Had for a year and a half, stopped working. The “product support” this page offers is a JOKE. Was gonna buy them again, but they’ve somehow gone up in price? 39.95 in March of 2024. Now it’s 69.95 “on sale” for 49.95? I’ll get a 20$ pair that sounds just as good 🫡

author: AlinaVIPG
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsStop charging after a while
body: They are great while they work but then randomly stop charging. Happened to two sets of these headphones purchased separately.

author: Mark F.
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsBattery doesn't last.  Needs charger 3 times a day.
body: It has good clarity, but the headset dies after 4hrs on a full battery. I would never purchase it again.

author: Eduardo
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsCalidad media baja!
body: Dejaré de comprarlos y probaré otra marca, eh comprado 4 durante 2 años y hoy solo sirve uno.

author: Cassandra R
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBUYER BEWARE
body: I should've known better since this is Apple's crap, but OMG never again. Back to soundcore. The Beats CONSTANTLY stop playing music and the ONLY solution is to unpair and repair. I've tried quitting the apps (both a music player and youtube) and reloading, won't play. I've tried rebooting my phone and it won't play. The only solution is a total reset of the bluetooth pairing to get it to play again. Calling apple's support is (as always) a nightmare, and I know the hell they give their agents because I have family member that works for them and they got in trouble for taking time off to go pick up their brother's kid because the brother got arrested (single dad). So crappy product from a crappy brand. The battery life is pointless when it's a daily battle to get music to KEEP PLAYING (I know, revolutionary thing to want in ear buds). The size and fit is fit, but the stupid tips come off so quickly from being jostled that I had to buy a whole different set of tips.

author: Phil
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsStopped working a few months in
body: Headphones stopped working after about 2 months and I can't return them.

author: MoLee
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLove these.  They stay in my ears when iPhone buds FO NOT
body: These are awesome headphones. I bought an extra pair for a friend who saw them and thought that they were great. Which they are.

author: Maxwell R.
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWould not recommend.
body: The sound quality sucks. If you listen to rock or metal, the eq sounds scooped. There is no way to skip a song with the ear pieces. Lastly, they do not stay in your ears if you workout. Would not recommend.

author: Anton Acosta
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsmmmmmmm.
body: lo mejor de estos audifonos es su estilo y la carga, y los bajos, pero los microfonos no sirven y debes en cuando salen defectuosos, normalmente se queman un audifono, o dejan de conectarse, he comorado 4, el mismo error.

author: demetrios lemonias
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsThey don’t last.
body: These sound good but they don’t last long. I bought 3 of these. The first one lasted 9 months the second one lasted 6 months the last one lasted 1 month. I won’t buy these again.

author: estarc
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsgood sound, bad cord
body: I would rate it higher, but the cord short and tightly wound and wraps around my neck in a way that's uncomfortable.

author: Joel F. Makela
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsStopped working shortly after purchase
body: Six weeks of light use and it stopped working.  Of course I could only return it for 30 days.  My experience is that quality has really gone downhill with beats products.  This is the second set of beats that failed within two months of light use.

author: Ben Schweitzer
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsHeadsup for those with sensory issues
body: The headphones are comfortable, and the sound quality is good. The battery life seems good so far, but my one complaint is that the microphone is on the inside of the part that sits on your neck, and anytime you brush against it or it moves, you can hear it through the headphones. It's honestly a bit of a sensory nightmare for me, and it's happening anytime I'm moving around. I'm considering sending them back because of this. This is not a commentary on the quality of the product because I can tell it's pretty high quality. However, as someone with sensory issues, I think it's important to mention this about these headphones for anyone else with sensory issues who is considering buying them.

author: Hoffman Shopper
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot working after 6 weeks
body: Quit working after 6 weeks...a piece of junk!!!!!  If you want a better review...replace them!!!

author: K
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsPoor battery life
body: Poor battery life

author: Ana Herrera
title: 5.0 out of 5 stars100% Recommended
body: I've been using these headphones for a long time now and they are some of the best on the market.

author: joseph Sarno
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGreat style, poor overall quality.
body: I really love the style, but they don’t perform well when you sweat. They stopped working after getting moisture from sweat and humidity.  Why market something that implies that it’s good for working out, but you can’t sweat on them.

author: Rupy
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBad bad bad
body: 3rd pair I have ordered and these things are horrible. Not up to the beats standards. Have bought 3-4 blue ones. First black pair I have bought. Battery lasts 3 hours!!! 3 hours and I have to turn my volume up. I need to find another company!!!

author: Amazon Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsJunk
body: Junk...barely used and they won't charge, turn on or reset.  Very disappointed.

author: Di Lucia
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsCheap product
body: Have bought 2 pairs and both have stopped working within about 70 days. Only holds a charge for about 5 hours of occasional phone conversation. Very little music played.

author: Rich
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsThese have a wiring issue that causes them to short out.
body: Don’t buy these headphones! I did enjoy them when they actually worked but they broke for no reason multiple times. I had to go to the Apple Store twice to get them fixed or replaced and they shipped me back the same headphones which broke again without reason. Eventually the warranty ran out and I ended up having to buy new headphones.

author: Ashley Lempea
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEasy to use. Can hear perfectly
body: Husband is a truck driver. This is his 3rd pair of these in 5 years and he absolutely loves them

author: ryan ranft
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsFail
body: Terrible headphones. Right bud stopped working in under 2 months

author: J
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat ear buds for my wife!
body: My wife was always losing her head phones and ear buds. Since these us “find my” on iPhone, she can always find them. They have held up to near constant use for a couple years now. She says they sound great, and have never had connectivity issues with them. She loves them.

author: Kate Rhoades
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsMade of extremely flimsy plastic
body: Horrible quality. They literally just fell apart one day. I tried fixing them with tape but it didn’t even work. Considering how much they cost, this is not acceptable. I contacted apple support and they didn’t offer to fix or replace them for free even though the product was faulty.

author: Nacaira
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot good quality
body: Worked for 3 months then stopped

author: M
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsSeeming lack of factory QC?
body: Ive had these for about three months and they have been a pain right off the bat. Besides pairing issues galore, random disconnects, and seemingly random battery life expectancy, these just seem flimsy as heck and easily broken. Today I have actually lost functionality of the power button on my set and the power is stuck on until the battery dies I suspect. I have tried resetting via the power button+volume button trick to zero avail as well. Whats more, before the power button failed and rendered the unit unusable, an annoying low pitch buzz began emitting from the right ear bud recently. It will cease when audio begins playing but super unfortunate for track pauses and the like. I work as a landscape gardener and sweat a bit and can be in some pretty rough conditions however not nearly enough to warrant such an early faliure for a unit that costs shy of 40 dollars. The last two pairs of "no-name" amazon buds lasted me near two years each, thus for double the price these are absolute refuse. The color is nice however.

author: Amy
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsOnly worked for 1 month
body: Purchased on May 19 2025 to give as a gift on June 15 for Father’s Day.  On July 19th 2025 they stopped working. They will not charge, will not power on and will not reset. We have tried different plugs, different cables, tried compressed air to ensure the connection is clean.  Amazon return window closed so now we are have to deal with Apple Support. I would not recommend these to anyone. The recipient loved the product for the 1 month it worked but is very disappointed with the quality.

author: keisha
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot good
body: This will be 3rd pair of beats heads, these are not lasting up good at all.

author: Frozen Gimp
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsSimple and portable
body: Great for what they are. I’ve purchased 3 - one for my personal devices, one paired to my work laptop for video calls, and a third for my wife. (For her to use; we pair conventionally because she’s not personally equipped with Bluetooth.) Their music quality isn’t stellar, but they are very convenient and portable. Mic quality is good enough for video calls. The seamless pairing to iOS devices is a plus.

author: I.A
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsStopped working after just 6 months of basic usage!
body: This was purchased to replace the same product (given to me as a gift) as that stopped working. Unfortunately, just after 6 months of basic usage,  the sound from one side stopped working. I'm really dissappointed as I bought this hoping it would last me a lot longer, and it wasn't a cheap item either!

author: Robert Jeski
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBuy new
body: Looked good until I saw what looked like ear wax in one piece and it was missing an ear piece. I didn’t even take them completely out of the box, sending them back and buying new ones from the store.

author: Thomas McGivney
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDisappointing quality
body: I had a pair of the Flex Beats from years ago and they were great. Our new puppy chewed them up and I thought I’d get a new pair. Unfortunately, the quality of the product has declined severely. I ordered a pair and they stopped working after one run. I returned those, ordered a second pair and they stopped working during their first run. In both cases I tried the hard reset but the earbuds had a buzz, would not play anything, and would not connect to the phone properly. Time to find something new.

author: Kyle Law
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsNot water resistant
body: Works great as long as you don't sweat.  Mine broke within 2 months.  I assume the water got in the charging port which doesn't have a cover when in use.

author: Luna
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsWired headphones with low volume
body: Dissatisfied with this product, the volume is low, the quality of sound is standard, one  volume control which goes low when you reach the max volume.  The fit is nice but I was expecting more from brand

author: Richie Rich..
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsFits perfect.
body: Sounds good.

author: Ea Oyler
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot sweat proof
body: Not sweat proof… Had them 6 weeks, I used them while I worked out side in the heat with them. They completely stopped working. Reached out to customer service it would be $70 to get them looked at / fixed.

author: MICHELE THOMAS
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsWorth it over and over again
body: These are my second set. I'm only buying again because the last ones were stolen. But I'd buy them over and over again.

author: Bin Zhang
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood quality.
body: Easy to use.

author: Apoorva Mishra
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect!
body: It’s perfect as I want !

author: devon
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDoes not pair or cinnect to devices
body: Does not pai with any device. It use to connect to devices then it just stopped.

author: Charles Goodwin
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsTerrific
body: Bought these for my wife because she kept losing the single buds constantly. These are either on the charger or on her ears. She loves them

author: Vicky Justus
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsHighly recommend
body: Last about 8 hours perfect for work or folding laundry at the laundry mat

author: Lauren Jagger McMullen
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDidn’t work long…
body: Stopped working after a month of use.

author: Jennifer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLong battery great sound
body: Battery lasts over 12 hours and tgt pause when you magnet them together. Love these

author: Rt M.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsB
body: Love em , great sounding buds 👍

author: Kindle Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Beats sound
body: Lightweight with great sound. My husband uses these on his mountain bike rides. They commonest wearily via iPhone to our Amazon music app. Super comfortable and size.

author: B STRONG
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsIt the Beats.
body: I really like this. It transfers between my phone and tablet and asked to be connected. Sound quality is good and people next to you can’t hear it. It can adjust the volume on your phone and tablet from the headphones. It came discharged so plug it in and it takes a couple hours. Enjoy.

author: Fox Boogie
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest headphones HANDS DOWN
body: These are the best headphones hands down I have tried many and none compares to these. I would normally have to have 2 pairs of headphones one for music one for speaking these DO BOTH .You  will not be disappointed sound is clear for music and conversations.

author: Gillian Stinnett
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsBoo
body: Died within 2 days of having them and never recharged again. Had to return because they wanted us to jump through hoops to replace

author: Tammy Atherton
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBeats earbuds
body: Love them for traveling!  Lightweight, sound is amazing

author: Susan
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsDisappointed
body: Sound was inferior, returned item.

author: LeftyG
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound and great for travel!
body: These are great, my 3rd set. (My dog chewed up the first one, but the 2nd one still works great! I just wanted a backup.) I love the blue, my favorite color. The sound is great. They are awesome for traveling since you can hang them around your neck and they don't take up much space in my bag. I have trouble with wireless earbuds fitting and staying in my ears, but these fit great. Plus, if it falls out of my ear, the cord keeps it from going too far.

author: ToddWalker
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsBeats Flex Review
body: I had these same headphones before fell in love with theme. This time around I realized I didn’t like the around the neck feature it has and the battery life is ok. Sound is amazing cannot deny that.

author: Leigh Ann Geiger
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat for sleeping.
body: Love these to sleep in.  They don’t hurt my ears! And don’t fall out.  The only thing I don’t love is it does have a light that can be kind of bright at night, but I haven’t let it stop me.  Color is adorable too!

author: Mandi Hudson
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWork & Personal Use Headphones - always on but not always in!
body: Am an exec admin assistant and these headphones are my go to daily use - for working and being able to multitask, be on a phone call but work on my phone. While not in use I appreciate being able to let them just hang on my neck and not have an ear bud in constantly. Over the last 4 years of daily use, personal and work, they keep their charge. I’m on my third pair and for the use I put them through I find they have a great life span and definitely worth the money. Just keep hoping Beats keeps manufacturing this style.

author: Rosalind
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSimple controls, good for calls while driving
body: Easy to use, hard to lose. Simple, no-frills, Just good basic sound for audiobooks and phone calls.

author: dAzl
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNeed to turn these off after use. Inconvenient.
body: I wish I liked these better. I didn't realize that you have to turn these off after use to save battery power. I'm not used to turning ear buds on and off. I always forget and when I go to use them, they're dead. I rarely use them as a result.

author: Chirlly
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsNot as described
body: Doesn't hold a charge long as described.

author: ramon
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMicro
body: El micro , no me gusta

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsHigh quality and comfortable
body: We got these headphones for my 12 year old son’s birthday.  He has a pair that go over the ears but when he’s jogging, running, riding around on the tractor they always slide around.  He says these are a 10/10 in his opinion because they fit in his ears good, cancel out  noise, and when he takes them out of his ears it acts as a necklace because the earbuds are magnetic and clip together. My whole family has Beats headphones because of the great sound quality, they hold a charge very well, and are comfortable.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSolid headphones
body: Great little headphones. Light sound good and battery lasts a long time!

author: US Military Supporter
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsPoor quality
body: This is my second pair of Flex Beats and after 3-4 uses it just stops working! Turns itself off and won’t connect to blue tooth?? I am very frustrated

author: JG
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsLow product life, low Apple support.
body: This product works great for a while. This is the second time I purchased the Beats Flex. They are comfortable, easy to use and provide decent sound. I use them mostly to listen to audio books and podcasts. The first pair I purchased lasted about three years. Then I pushed the power button a little too hard because it would start and I damaged it. Since that was my fault, I decided to give them another try. I was super careful with the power button and the volume button to not damage them. This pair refused to charge after 14 months. I contacted Apple support via text and the agent was super nice, patient and tried to find a solution for me. Unfortunately, no solution worked. It was offered that I could send the product in to Apple and they would fix what seemed to be a hardware issue for $70.10.  I found that to be unacceptable, as I could purchase a new pair for only $45.00. I asked for a free repair or a free replacement pair. My request was denied. For that reason I cannot recommend this product to anyone because of the inferior life of this product and Apple’s refusal to strand stand behind their product.

author: Benjamin A. Liebelt
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDon't pay more than $10 for these as that's what their worth.
body: The actual sound quality isn't bad, but the lack of functionality on these ear buds is why they suck. There is no indication when you turn them on, turn them off and they don't auto connect to Bluetooth and the Bluetooth range is only a few feet. There is no indication of the battery life, including in my phone, nor is there a y indication that its about to die, they just die. The battery is so small, you need to charge them quite often. It doesnt have any pause or skip track buttons, just the weird on/off and volume. Overall, absolutely terrible. These are not worth more than $10 or maybe $15.

author: cramitsucko
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsGARBAGE
body: My first pair lasted over a year. Then they just stopped working for no apparent reason. I bought another pair because the form function is exactly what I want and sound quality is okay. But the second pair stopped working 33 days after purchase. Just stopped working at the end of my work day after light use throughout the day. I’ve tried every troubleshooting tip they offer, but my phone can’t even see them at this point. The power button is unresponsive despite three successful factory resets. I can’t return them and they offer zero real support for their defective device. DO NO BUY THESE HEADPHONES THEY ARE GARBAGE.

author: Bob from Oklahoma
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsBeware if you need support.
body: To me, these Beats Flex earbuds are much less convenient to use than less expensive ones from Senso.  They are awkward to turn on.  I didn't use them much, and after 4 months, they quit working -- won't power on.  Apple support for Beat products is very difficult to contact online.  The phone support person was very polite, but had difficulty in looking up the serial number.  (Yes, there is a serial number printed in very tiny print on every set.)  He offered to let me take the earbuds to their closest store for service . . . but they had no appointments available.  So, I would have been going 50 miles away to the second closest store.  In the end, I was able to return the earbuds to Amazon.  I won't be reordering.

Amazon pushed me to Beats support which was a bigger fail than the ear buds themselves. When the device was malfunctioning, I immediately thought about replacing it with another. Now, I wouldn't dream of ever buying this product again. It's quite a piece of garbage.

author: Lucas K Prater
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGood for 11 months. Then batteries stopped charging.
body: I bought these July 22, 2024. It is now May 27, 2025 and the Right-side earbud has stopped charging so it dies almost immediately when I use them now. I used these for lifting weights so I only wear them in the gym 3 days a week for a couple hours at a time. I leave them in my car the rest of the time. Leaving them out in the car, in the cold could have lessened the battery life but I have no proof of that—just speculating. These earbuds were pretty good for the money. I listen to audiobooks/podcasts in the gym so I never had any complaints about the sound quality. The bluetooth also works really well. It always connects immediately. My only complaint is that the right earbud's battery seems to be kaput, so I'll need to try another pair. I probably won't buy these again due to the relatively short lifespan of the batteries (less than a year). For the money, these cheap-o, offbrand, chinese earbuds worked fine. I paid $27.27 so basically $30 for pretty good bluetooth, wireless, handsfree sound in the gym. They worked well under sweaty conditions. But again, for less than 1 full year. My only complaint is that the batteries seem to be low quality. I probably should have brought them inside at night so they weren't exposed to the cold, but then I'd be sacrificing the convenience of never having to remember my earbuds when I go to the gym. If I had to do that, inevitably I'd forget them and then I'd be pissed that I'd have to use old-school wired earbuds. So I guess for $30 I got good bluetooth and the convenience of always having them in the car—for 11 months. Decent trade I guess.

author: Des
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsPretty good performance, huge device flaw….
body: The sound is pretty good, the fit is pretty good, but his earbuds have an unbelievably annoying flaw that you can’t get rid of…. when you try to charge them, despite them being off they connect to any Bluetooth device you’re already using with other earbuds or speakers. Your sound is literally going into the charging port. If you turn it off at your phone, it turns itself back on intermittently while it’s charging. Not sure who the bonehead is who decided they should charge while on and trying to connect to a Bluetooth device but it’s obviously the dumbest thing in the history of Bluetooth devices and it doesn’t matter how many times you turn it off, it just turns itself back on. Your only option is literally disabling Bluetooth features on your phone or computer until it’s fully charged so you can turn it off and with a range of 20-30 feet, there is very few places you can charge it that it won’t try to hijack your Bluetooth device.  It also loses the ear coverings on a semi regular basis so make sure you buy the four dollar set of spares on Amazon.

The only reason I gave 4 stars is because the instructions state that the buds come with extra ear tips but none were included in the box.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEverything I'm looking for, good value
body: Overview – Long lasting, good sound, good mic, wireless charging, everything I’m looking for and no downside. Background – I wear earbuds almost all day, whether I’m listening to audio books, podcasts, or calling into work meetings. I wanted something that clipped over-the-ear instead of just sticking in place because I sometimes wear them while mountain biking, and I’m worried they’ll fall out and get lost/broken. I wanted wireless charging and a long battery life. Pros – Always works. I’ve had this product a few years now (on a 2nd pair) and never needed to replace it due to a functionality issue. (I lost one ear bud when I dropped the case. Thus the “2nd pair”). Feels comfortable enough to wear all day Battery lasts 6-8 hours of constant use. Case recharges them very quickly. Case charger uses USB C and can also be charged wirelessly. I love this combo because in the past the charger port is usually the failure point on my devices, and USB C or wireless seem to be the best solution. Sound is good. I can’t say I’m an expert on sound quality for music, etc. But for meetings and speech, I have no issues. Others can also hear me clearly when I talk, which has been an issue with other devices. Cons – It’s a small con, but I wish the case snapped shut or was held together slightly better. Everytime the case drops to the floor, you can just count on the earbuds popping out. I don’t think these are overpriced, but there are much lower cost options if those meet your needs. Final Thoughts – These are my go-to ear buds if I ever need to replace, them I’ll re-order the same product.

Oh and they look great, not that you or anybody ever looks at them, and that isn't a criteria for me, but they have that "quality hi tech" look so another great first impression

author: Julia Harris
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsHeadphones fine but questionable warranty
body: Headphones work fine said they came with a warranty attempt to contact them about that never heard back.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsGood sound, but issues connecting
body: These started randomly not connecting or connecting to another device. Only had for 3 months.

author: Susannah Wegner
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsAccidentally bought same brand
body: Only 6 hours on barely used it until batteries low & dying. Very comfortable though just wish their life was longer.

author: JEH the Voice
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood at first but lack longevity.
body: I have had these since 2022 and found them to be sufficient. The wrap around piece does get loose over time so the ear piece does not stay as snug when working in the yard. Also if you wear glasses they tend to slip after talking or even eating while listening to music. The sound quality is as expected for a low cost product so don't expect a Bose or any other over the ear listening experience. They do work nicely for phone calls as long as you are within the required distance of 25 feet. I'd buy them again if the piece to hold closer to the ear was stronger over time.

author: rambofb18
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat wireless earbuds for running!
body: Awesome product! Fit in the ear really well. Work great while running. Highly recommended!

author: Naomi Reaves
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsTerrible buy
body: These do not work underwater. This is the worst investment I ever made. Do not buy.

author: Kyle
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsCharging pins
body: The charging pins to connect to the headphones and charger have a tough time staying together. I just kind of mess with it. Until it works and then I just leave it alone and hope my phone doesn't automatically connect to it in the middle of the night

author: kathleen benish
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsDisappointed consumer
body: I purchased these in February 2024.  17 months later they are dead. I contacted the manufacturer BMANI via email.  I still have not received a response.  I didn’t realize I was purchasing “disposable” 😡 earbuds.

author: Curtis D.
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsCharger not working
body: Sound quality and connection to iPhone are good.  But I have had these for 3 months and the charge indicator has never been at 100%.  I have used 3 different chargers but that didn't help.  This morning it was at 51% after charging all night.  I used them for about 2 hours today and they have been charging for almost 3 hours now and it is showing 38%.  I'm not expecting them to be working tomorrow morning.

author: Sivakumar Gopal
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDoesn't hold charge after six months
body: Bought on December 4, 2024 , now in July 2025 it stopped holding charge. Crappy product. Don't buy.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe BEST Air Buds for the MONEY.
body: These are CLEARLY the best air buds for the MONEY.  The sound they deliver is clear and can get loud.  AWESOME product.  I'm buying six more for my wife and kids.

author: Anna
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsKeep getting disconnected
body: Keep getting disconnected,  they work for 3 weeks and now they donot connect at all. Keep saying couldn't connect.

author: Kitty Card
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsRight ear piece cuts out
body: Right ear piece cuts out after about 30 minutes of use. Says it's connected and Its fully charged, but I have to place it in its case and reconnect it. Also the placement is backwards like the right is on the left in the case. Sound quality is good and is clear.

author: Pouya Mafi
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWaste of money
body: ve only been using this for about a month—just 30 minutes at a time, three times a week during workouts. At first, I was excited; it looked good and seemed to work well. But now the left headphone has completely stopped working. It still charges, but won’t turn on. Really disappointing, especially considering a $10 pair I bought from TJ Maxx lasted longer. Makes me wonder if most of these glowing reviews were written right after unboxing, before people actually used it for a while. Based on my experience, it’s not worth the hype

author: Kindle Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsStopped working after 3 months
body: Suddenly stopped working and amazon won't help me or replace the item

author: tim
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat buds!
body: Fantastic. Got them on sale a little over $20. I'd pay full price! There great.

author: Debbie Sample
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsStays charged forever!!
body: Love these ear buds!  Fit perfectly and the charge lasts forever!!

author: Kimi
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWork great
body: Love these!

author: Louis Kuhelj
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsCan't recommend for really sweatty runners
body: Not a good product for my specific needs. However, I have to qualify that no bluetooth earbuds have lasted me for very long. For some reason these simply stopped working. They couldn't connect to each other or the devices. Eventually they just died in a month or so. This could be because I run and sweat a great deal and maybe the salty sweat got into the works and corroded the circuit board. Not sure that this was the reason.

author: Adrienne
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLove these
body: One Year update: I have one pair of samsung earbuds, one pair of apple pros and this pair. This is by far the best pair of earbuds I've ever owned. I read w/ them, sleep w/ them, workout w/ them and they never fall out. I once lost them and I found them months later under the chair and they were STILL CHARGED .. I couldn't believe it! I usually keep one in my ear and it stays charged all day while im reading. Im just so pleased with this purchase and they are never dirty. I keep a sticky suction cup popit on them and stick them to my Kindle so I don't loose them so much. Definitely recommend if you are on a budget, also I have significant hearing loss and I have aids and these are very loud and I hear great w/ these.

author: Noelani
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat earbuds!
body: These are great earbuds! The sound is good and I really like how they fit over my ear. Love these so much!!!!!

author: Imran
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood quality
body: These are pretty loud and have a decent amount of bass.

author: Jessie Carson
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsFine for the price but ugly lol
body: Good for the price, decent sound & easy to connect but the color doesn’t look at all like the pretty shiny teal I ordered. Very dark almost matte finish teal. They also FEEL very cheap, especially the case but I have trouble with earbuds staying in so they do their job just fine for with my Rog.

author: Albert Williams
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsLow quality + they dont offer replacements or returns
body: One of the earphones will not charge in the charging case, no matter how much I adjust it.  The other earphone charges just fine.  The headphones sound quality is noticeably poor.  Add in the fact you can't get a replacement or return when someone goes wrong.  I can't justify the price.

author: Kathy F
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsEarbuds💚
body: Needed this fast, sounds so good. Especially for shifts!!🎧🙏🏼 amazing sound quality for a great price, love the cute green case🩵💚💼

author: John Doe
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsMine weren’t the best
body: Good at first but didn’t last . Wont charge and randomly connects to bluetooth

author: Amazon Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsPoor performing product with my iPhone
body: Unsatisfactory product. Even after pairing this bluetooth with my iPhone, about 40% of my incoming calls would not go to these bluetooth speakers while I was wearing them. These earbuds would also, by default pair to my phone while they were charging in the case. This would result in not being able to hear incoming calls. Therefore, they took an early trip to the bluetooth graveyard.

author: Mrs.  Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNot metallic green :(
body: I love these earbuds. It is like my 4th pair I have bought only because I keep loosing them. However I ordered these green ones they are not a metallic color they are ugly green :(

author: Bob Jose
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsAwful
body: these are the worst. They don't charge at all and keep disconnecting. I can only give this a 1 star because it won't allow me to give zero stars

author: Kerry S.
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsWorkable for ~4 months
body: Worked well for 4-5months.  Now, they don’t charge anymore so are completely useless 😖

author: Piper Butcher
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsHorrible product
body: One earbud quit charging after 3 weeks

author: Shopping
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDecent
body: Lasted a year for me before the battery on one side began to die and wouldn’t keep a charge.

author: Nathan Seltzer
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsStopped charging after 6 months
body: I got these for the gym and they were great until the right earbud stopped charging after about 6 months. The right side was a little finicky from the beginning. It would occasionally not charge and sometimes even connect to my phone while in the case. For awhile, I could sort of jiggle it out take it in and out of the case to get it to charge. But eventually, kapoot. I wasn't hard on them, didn't take them in the pool or anything weird. Anyway, they are cheap, but not cheap enough to replace every 6 months. Back to the drawing board.

author: Jonathan Wong
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsHeadphones don’t seat well in case
body: These earbuds were relatively comfortable and super lightweight. I used them through a variety of relatively rigorous workouts and they survived repeated sweat exposure. However, a major issue is that they don’t sit perfectly inside of the case causing them to either not charge, or they’ll charge and discharge continuously draining the case battery. I’m not sure if this is just a one-off issue, but I’d rather spend a little more money for a more reliable product.

author: Anthony NUG
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsHave owned over 4 pairs. Great value and basic stuff, for serious athletic use get something else.
body: Have owned 4 pair of these, clearly gave them multiple chances. I used them daily during work outs and found that these work great for leisurely activities if your just sitting around. They have the athletic bands which implies they're build a bit more for workouts. Although my first pair failed and wouldn't charge, 2nd pair the right one wouldn't turn on anymore, 3rd pair the on/off button shorted out so it just kept cycling through power off/on, and after all that I have a working 4th pair. The issue is that they are NOT sweat and water resistant, and even then any sweat or any kind of moisture just cause them to fail. Now just use these for basic stuff like travel/office and have a different set of buds that are sweatproof for the gym.

author: ESMERELDA P.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsgreat
body: great for the value

author: Critical Buyer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsListen up - which is easy with these cool bmani earbuds!
body: Outstanding for the price - pleasant sound with good low-end. Easy to use and pair. Each earbud has it's own volume control. Work great with my iPhone. The case is very convenient and the battery life is great. The only thing remotely negative is they have to be manually switched between BT devices every time I go from phone to laptop - but then, most earbud-type headsets are similar.

title: 1.0 out of 5 starsnot what i expeted, not recommended

As i was in the website and other reviews these comments are similar. it seems like they are prone to fail.

author: Jesse sawyer
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDo not buy these if you plan on using them to take phone calls.
body: The headphones do fit nicely around your ear, and the sound quality is OK. They hold a charge for a long time and it’s easy to use them for long periods of time without them going dead. The worst part about them is you cannot take phone calls on them because the speaker does not pick up any of what you’re saying. Every time I’m listening to music I have to take my headphones out every time I get a phone call to answer the phone so people can hear me.  That’s actually one of the reasons I bought these headphones is so that I could be hands-free with my cell phone at work. But they do not work at all for that.

title: 2.0 out of 5 starsOnly lasted 6 months.
body: Great for the first few months. However, after 6 months they now are spotty connection and consistently I have people asking if I can hear them which means they can't hear me. It will crackle in and out after only using them for 10 min so not great for business calls.

author: Rybo
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsSound quality meh, ability to stay on your ears while sweaty: fantastic
body: Ok these are fine. I would say they are a bit louder than higher quality earbuds. Sound quality is not the same as beats etc, but for the price it makes sense. I use these for mowing when I'm sweating a lot and they are absolutely perfect for that. Normal earbuds tend to fall out of my ears when I'm sweating a lot. These will hang on no matter what. This is a good deal for the money and the use case. My only real complaint on these is that the left earbud fits in the right spot in the charger case and vice versa. Annoying but not that big of a deal.  Buy em for sweaty activities and you won't be disappointed.

title: 1.0 out of 5 starsWon’t stay charged

body: They work, but the sound quality is not that great. Theres better ones on Amazon for the same price

author: Lucky
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsStopped working after 1 year
body: 1 Stopped working after 1 year. Otherwise is a great product

author: J French
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDon't last
body: These did not last a year.  Don't buy.

author: Leighton Montgomery
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery good
body: Good qaulity sound and good qaulity built...I've had mine over a year and they are always with me I use them daily

author: ROBYNN GIROUX
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPink
body: Been using these a few weeks now, and I love them.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsNot multipoint.
body: NOT multipoint. Con NOT connect to 2 devices at the SAME time.

author: Bea Walker
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat for Workouts — Still Going Strong!
body: I’ve had these earbuds for a while now, and they haven’t let me down. The over-ear hooks keep them secure during workouts—no slipping, even when I’m sweating. The sound quality is solid for the price, and I love that the LED display shows exactly how much battery is left for each earbud and the case. Battery life is impressive—I only charge them every few days even with daily use. The color is super cute too! I still use these all the time and they’ve held up great.

author: Hi
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsDecent for casual use, but don’t expect premium reliability.
body: These bmani wireless earbuds are definitely a case of "you get what you pay for." The sound quality was surprisingly good for the price, but the connectivity was very inconsistent and often dropped out. Decent for casual use, but don’t expect premium reliability.

author: carmen jacquelone candelario
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe price is great , the size and the easy mess to connect
body: Love these

author: susan guay
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Earphones
body: These are great!  They stay charged a long time and they fit nicely in my ears.  The color is more of a dark greenish color and not at all metallic like they look like in the photo but It doesn't matter so not worth complaining about.

author: Kindle Customer
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsFailed product
body: I was excited for these headphones. As a runner I was surprised they stayed in when on the treadmill without issue but was disappointed after 2 months of use one ear bud has stopped working. Would not recommend purchasing.

author: Alexander trahan
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsMy personal experience
body: Right ear piece stopped working a few days after the purchase

author: MB
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsWorked well until they didn't
body: The product fits great and produces very good sound ... until they don't. I owned two pairs of these. One pair lasted less than a year. The second pair lasted just short of two years. The product spec says it has a 5 year battery, but in both cases, the left ear pod just quit taking a charge and died. The indicator showed that they were charging. Both reported low battery just before they died. The contacts were clean and I went through trouble shooting procedure: Turn them off, charge them up, delete the device from the phone, restart the phone and re-pair them - to no avail. When they worked, I used them every day and exercised with them. The were on the charger when I wasn't using them. The Amazon page points to the BMANI website for warranty info, but I couldn't find any warranty info on the website. Decide for yourself whether the value is there. I bought a competitor for round three.

author: Kevin
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood Quality Sport BT Earbuds
body: I bought these bluetooth earbuds about a week ago. They are good quality. Good sound. Easy connect. Battery life good. Especially good for sports, jogging, gym, cleaning, tilting, bending activities because they won't fallout as much🤷🏼‍♂️ So far so good with this Chinese brand😃

author: Ultramarp
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product for the price!
body: This are really suitable if what you're looking for is to listen to music while working out or running, not good for calls though

author: Kindle Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsUGHHH!
body: Was so pleased. They were great  Now they will not pair with phone or iPads.  Ptchased in September and quit working in June.  Would definitely not recommend! Edit.  Seller contacted me through Amazon and gave me a full refund.  Will watch reviews and possibly try them again in the future.

author: Michael Bowen
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Sound, Crisp and Clear.  Well made😁
body: These are fantastic, great sound, crisp and clear. Makes taking long walks really enjoyable instead of exercise.  I can’t say enough good about them.  They are well made, completely comfortable and keep their charge. I couldn’t be more pleased.

author: Aaron S.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSubmerged in water mistake
body: I know that it doesn't mention a word about being water resistant, or water proof, etc., however,  I'd like to share this.  I was wearing them in the pool, and I guess I got a little too relaxed,  because I dunked my head under the water.  The earbuds floated off my ears and sank to the bottom.  I have terrible vision and couldn't see the light purple color, and I can't open my eyes under water due to contacts.  Sure wish I had goggles.  Oh well,  my point is, they were submerged in water for a good min. & a half, and they still work!!!! Very impressed with this product.  It appears to truly be idiot proof. 😁

author: Meredith
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsReview of two sets of earbuds from this brand.
body: In the past I had bought both the light blue and the lavender earbuds. The case is quite bulky and if you’re wearing jeans or anything with small pockets, they’ll likely fall out easily. The blue earbuds lasted from May-ish of 2024 - September of 2024. The left earbud stopped working after falling out of my pocket one last time. The right earbud still works, but the left is useless. The purple ones I replaced in March of 2025 after I noticed the right earbud was a bit quieter than the left and there was an underlying buzzing in the audio. I work at a pool and so there’s a lot of moisture, especially when I put them in after getting in the water. It hasn’t detrimentally deteriorated the audio. The purple right earbud even fell into the water and seemed to still be working fine after. I’m a fan of the over ear grips and the silver buttons that sticks out rather than being a button blended into the surface like many other brands. It’s nice to be able to skip a song by lifting my shoulder to double click the button. I don’t think the microphone was that good though. Overall, they’re a decent brand for the price, but I’d recommend only if you don’t mind that they may not last a very long time. Don’t use the headphone decibel thing if you’re on apple. It will adjust the sound to be that exact decibel constantly rather than preventing you from raising the volume higher than that level.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsEarbuds will not take a charge
body: We received these earbuds on July 12th. I believe on July 14th I messaged the seller letting them know that one of the buds would not charge up in the case.  We still have not heard back from the seller.  We have purchased several of these earbuds over the past couple of years.  Now I am gonna be looking into ordering a set from elsewhere.

author: Debbie Paille
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSo comfortable I can sleeping them! 💤
body: These earphones are easy to pair, fit comfortably and the sound is great.  I was surprised at the battery life and the case charges in a short time . These feel like secure fit leaving me to hike and explore without worrying of one falling out.

author: J. Turner
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsFavorite Headphones, even over Beats.
body: I have owned several pairs of Beats wireless headphones and this set is still my all time favorite. The sound quality is great. The charge lasts forever. I love being able to see the battery percentage as soon as I open the case. My first pair lasted 2 years, until I dropped one in the pool. I immediately ordered another pair. My first pair had gotten wet in the past and still worked great, but being fully submerged in the pool is what did them in. Luckily, these headphones are still affordable and arrive quickly, which made replacing my original pair easy. By far, my favorite wireless headphones and worth the $25.

author: Tico
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsVery accurate description
body: They are very comfortable and acceptable quality sound, not as loud as I expected, long life battery, very useful info in the box showing the buds and box itself charge percentage, it is worth for the money, I definitely would buy them again.

author: LUCIANA FIGUEIRÓ MENDES
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsLeft earbud doesn't work anymore
body: I bought this product ~18 months ago and for the past 3 months, the left earbud works intermittently. It is very annoying, I wasn't expecting for it to last only over a year. I think this fall into the famous saying "buy cheap, buy twice"...

author: JR
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA good quality Wireless earbud
body: The media could not be loaded. These headphones work really really well the connectivity has never been an issue for me and they deliver a great sound quality and fit my ears really well. I was a little skeptical at first because there was a huge price drop and usually that's a red flag but to this day I could not be more happy with them really really impressed with their durability the ease of pairing the battery life and their design I would definitely recommend buying two pairs because it's always good to have an extra set of something that's quality

author: VICKI G.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood fit and sounds
body: Love the fit..over the ear helps them stay in place. Charging and maintaining charge is very good.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsA definite purchase
body: Sound is amazing! Sleek look too with a nice case that serves as the charging station.

body: I absolutely loved these earbuds but I’ve only had them a little over a year and they will barely stay charged for 2 hours now… they used to stay charged about all day so it’s very disappointing

author: Amazon Customer
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsCharging issue
body: Left earbud won't charge.  Post is stuck down, so no contact with earbud.  How do I fix?

body: Loved them the whole time they worked, seamless pairing and switching between them, but after just about 1 year they stopped working entirely today. They just keep looping saying "power on" and won't stay connected to anything.

author: Jey52572
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsNot sweat proof
body: Starts malfunctioning when sweat hits it

author: Jamie
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsBroke in first few weeks.
body: Good feel.  When I bought these in May 2023, the left ear went to one third volume after a few weeks.  I could never hear in them again when there was loud ambient noise.

author: Ai Burk
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsLove them
body: These are my second pair and my first my cat ate....... best and most comfortable wireless ear buds I've ever used

author: JeanB
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsMuffled sound
body: The sound quality on my end is excellent, but everyone I speak with says I sound like I’m in a fishbowl — distant and muffled, as if I’m far away.

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat inexpensive head phones for sports!
body: Easy to setup and has great support around your ear.  I play basketball in them and they last all game.  Fit well and charge very fast.  Touch control to pickup calls, change songs, etc.  Great Value!

title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat product, positive experience

author: mjs
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsReliable. I've purchased 4 sets over the years
body: Why did you pick this product vs others?: I'm a repeat customer. This is the fourth set I have purchased over the years, I keep coming back to this brand as they are reliable and long lived. Also they hold a charge longer than my AirPods. Recently on one of my previously purchased set, the hook on the earpiece broke off. However I have had that set for years. I like having multiples as one set is always ready to go. They are super comfortable and the sound quality is good. Not like AirPods but acceptable, especially for traveling or working in the yard without worrying they might fall out. Slightly disappointed as I was expecting a shimmery green as pictured on the item page, however it was the same flat green color as the ones I've previously ordered. Sound quality: Upper end of moderate Value for money: great value for the cost Durability: have had several sets for years and only recently has one broken Design: soft ergonomic ear hooks Clarity: upper end of moderate Ear support: stays put and is comfortable.

author: anjul
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe best earbuds ever!
body: Finally, I have found the earbuds for me! I can never keep any (and I have tried many) in my ears; so the over-the-ear solves that problem. They connected effortlessly and have the best range of any I have ever had! I've only had them a few days, but absolutely love them. The sound has been great and even took a phone call the first day and that worked just fine. The price was great too!

The sound quality is amazing. They are perfect for people who have small ears. I also love how it goes over your ears and stays and I don’t have to worry about them falling out of my ears. Thank God! I think I definitely got the value of my money it’s way better than Apple and Beats if you don’t that kind of money.
