body: These are so comfortable I forget I have them on. The Microphone is great, on phone calls or video calls no issues! Connectivity and sound are excellent!

author: Tony S.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent sound and great price for what you get.
body: Excellent sound, super easy setup, great price for what you get.

author: Andrea
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsDON'T GET THEM
body: I DO NOT RECOMMEND! The ear buds worked well for a couple days. Then only the right one worked. And then right one stopped working and the left one worked. A couple days later the left one wouldn't connect to my phone. I thought maybe they were close to dead so I had them on the charger for hours and they appeared to be fully charged. Nope. It says it's at 10%, and still only one ear bud is connecting.

author: Derran Smalls
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsQuality product
body: These earbuds outperform the Skull Candy earbuds they replaced. They are easily paired and light enough to forget they're being worn. The sound quality is more than I expected for the price I paid. One of them accidentally fell off when I removed my sunglasses and was lost in a dirt yard with constant vehicle traffic. However using the app's finding feature, I located it by the loud  chirping sound above the sound of nearby heavy equipment. It was covered in dirt and had already been ran over but to my surprise it was still flawlessly functioning as if it just came out of the box.

author: katox1
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsAlmost perfect
body: Good headphones that allow me to hear my surroundings while running but also enjoy my music. My only complaint and reason I will probably not wear these to run in anymore is that once sweat gets onto the touch portion of the earbud, it goes absolutely haywire. Wet hands make it impossible to use and the tactile sensors think your touching them repeatedly making it pause and play for the next 30 minutes. I miss physical buttons and will look for headphones that have them in the future.

author: Richard G.
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsPC Latency
body: I wanted these for PCVR but the latency was way too much. They do seem to have a gaming mode on mobile, but I haven't messed with it too much so I can't say if it's good or bad. They also have a lot of bass for open-ears, but I turned it down out of preference (which you can't do on PC without an equalizer, which adds even more latency).

author: fun great game
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsEar buds
body: They work well.

author: Patricia L.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfectly fine.
body: I had misplaced my pairs, so I bought these at the last minute. They work perfectly fine and at a lower cost. 👍🏻

author: HK
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsNot great quality sound
body: Comfortable and attractive but static in audio :( Returned

author: Jash0Beam
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood Quality, No Sound Cancelling
body: Overall these are good, but they're not designed to cancel sound.

author: Selina
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNice fit
body: I find them very nice and the volume control can also be controlled by the phone only yes I haven't received the phone call yet some kind of still stuck on that

author: Edith
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat headphones for the price BUT allergy caution
body: Was looking for a non-earplug headphones. This one works great, doesn’t leak sound, and picks up audio clearly during calls. Perfect product for the price. However, please be aware if you’re allergic to silicone materials. (I was allergic to the earpiece of AirPods Pro). The piece that clips to your ears has triggered eczema on my skin behind my ears. I used some cloth tape to wrap around it, but it seems like it’s not helping much.

author: John Hubbard
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsComfortable, sounds good.
body: As a fan of good Audio, I was sceptical seeing that these were so cheap and not sure how good open earbuds would sound. I've had expensive in ears and hated them because they hurt to wear. Tried these open ears out, not expecting much. I'm very surprised by how good these sound and how comfortable they fit. Definitely a believer in open ear buds now. Only complaint is they don't self charge in the case, but the batteries seem to have good usage time anyways.

author: Some other guy
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAnother quality product from Anker
body: I'm very happy with these. I wanted an open air over-the ear set of headphones without any noise canceling so I can hear my disabled child calling me, and these are perfect. They are so comfortable that I forget I have them on. Sound quality is not quite up to air pods of course. but then the price is a small fraction of air pods. Anker is one of the most reliable companies I know.

author: nsr
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsRight side ear piece battery dead in 2-3 hours while left side still has 70%
body: Sound quality is pretty decent for this type of blue tooth pair. Decently compact, thought not as compact as some of the ear buds. Voice quality seems decent too, and range is good. Where it falls shorts is weird battery life issue. After couple of hours of calls, left earbud is at 70% and right one at 20% and disconnects? I know right one act as master, that does not mean it will consume several times more battery.  Also, why it shuts down at 20% in middle of calls? I looked to see if there is any option in the app if I can make left as master to get a reference, but I do not see that option. Either this headset I have defective, or all are like that if we use for voice calls. Another negative is, the case designed fit the unit when ear hook is fully closed/retracted position. So everytime I need to expand and put it, and close it and put it back. So it is not one hand operation anymore. But biggest drawback is the usable Battery life with Right side unit dead with 20% charge and left still has 70% in after 2 hours of calls. Probably going back.

author: Weezy
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsWorth the money
body: I bought these to Run and workout in. They stay on my ear great and the sound is also great. One on the ear buds stop charging so that was a disappointment so I’m down to one. Other than that great product for the money

author: Stargate Command
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound
body: Excellent clarity and quality. I love that they are adjustable.

author: Ms. R
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsNo complaints yet after 7 months
body: Solid earbuds. Avoids ear fatigue that I experienced with in-ear buds.

author: Bobby
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsMy search is over
body: I'm DONE!!!!! Yes I am finally done. The search is over. Ear comfort CHECK. Touch response CHECK. Water resistant DOUBLE CHECK (I look like i jumped in a pool i sweat so bad). Battery life TRIPLE CHECK (it's sooooo nice to work half my shift and not hear "battery low"). These headphones are great i even got my wife a pair. I have been searching so long for good headphones and I have found them you should get you a pair.

author: Rachel Vannest
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsStay in my ears but sound a little hollow
body: These were surprisingly good! Earbuds never stay in my ears so i was specifically looking for some with the little hooks or whatever and i was excited when i saw these dont have to actually go in your ears. They stay put really well. I can wiggle my ears, which means i move them subconciously 24/7. That causes a lot of discomfort with earbuds, but these don't hurt my ears at all! Something about the audio quality sounds a little bit hollow if that makes sense, but im not an audio snob so its not really a big deal to me. Overall, pretty good! Idk if i can reccomend these at full price, but i bought them for about $25 on sale so i have no big complaints

author: michael
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsPoor battery life
body: The seller advertises these earbuds as having an 8-hour battery life, yet they don't last a minute over 5 hours of active use. Incompetent when working an active job. Sound quality is also quite underwhelming.

author: AmazonCustomer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest ear buds I’ve bought.
body: The adjustable ear hooks insure a great fit,

author: BLINGZGURL
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsVery comfortable
body: So far, so good. The sound is great and they're very comfortable. I love how the ear hook adjusts around the ear. Overall, they're great.

author: Bre
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat for people who don’t like ear buds
body: So far these are great! I have only used them once but I do like them. I struggle with ear buds fitting into my ear properly and staying in. These are so nice that they just hook around your ear and don’t go in like an ear bud. They are very comfortable. The sound is good and clear, I asked someone around me if they could hear my music and they said no so that was a plus as well.

author: Merrie Knightly
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSuper comfortable and great sound
body: These are the second pair of these I have purchased. I have very sensitive ears and cannot wear anything that goes in the ear. These are so comfortable and the sound is great. I now have a pair for home and one for work.

author: dwscetanagi
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPleased with purchase
body: Excellent sound and fit.

author: Marie
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood quality for the price!
body: Good quality!!

author: Ping
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsPerfect for exercizing outdoors
body: Does exactly what I need them to do; they stay on my ear when I run and jump rope, unlike the in-ear pods that always slip out once I start sweating. Also like the fact that I can still hear the outside world (like people/cars behind me). Great price too.

author: Naomi Edwards
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe sound your missing
body: This product is great. They are comfortable, easy to adjust, provides great sound, and the battery last a long time.

author: maria von Nordeck
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSound
body: Great price! Clear sound and they stay on my ears !

author: Amazon Customer
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsPoor battery life
body: Poor battery life... Sucks

author: Nunya Business
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsExtremely comfy but the case and buttons are lacking badly
body: EDIT: apparently you can go into the app and change or add functions by button taps but had I not scanned the QR code I would have had no idea because the manual it comes with has no mention of the customization in the app! I found these to be extremely comfortable. I love the fact that they can be adjusted to different positions as not everyone has the same size and shape ears! The sound quality is also excellent. These were easily the comfiest between boytond, and haowolf that I tried. Now for the bad…. The button functions are horrible. It’s double tap to play/pause with one of them and then it’s double tap to skip on the other and that’s it! There’s no volume adjustment tapping feature and now previous track feature either. And the lack of functions is fine, it’s just annoying I need to pull out my phone to adjust the volume or go to a previous track if I’m feelin a song. Now for the worst part about these headphones. The case is extremely far behind compared to the cases of the other 2 brands I tried. There is no percentage level on the case so I have noooo idea when the case needs to be recharged. There is also ZERO indication as to what percentage the headphones are at when charging them in the case or if they are at any point fully charged! When I put them in the case there’s a white light that goes on, but only for a second and then it disappears! Unfortunately the case is extremely lacking as is the button functions. But as a mail carrier working 10-12 a day with these around my ears the comfort is the most important to me. I wonder if I got a defective case or if the functionality of the case is really that bad…

author: Alan J. Bernstein
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsgreat replacement if you love your headphones
body: fairly easy to affix. super comfortable

author: Puh Fifer
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsNot Quite IP55
body: I bought these for their listed IP55 rating, but they have stopped working after I was caught in the rain for about 20 minutes. Worked well until then, but I would recommend avoiding any exposure to moisture.

author: Lucas
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound
body: I got these for my daughter. Didn't want to spend a lot, but needed something with good quality. These are far better than the stuff at any of the stores like Walmart. Sound is actually very crisp and clean for the price. Charges quickly and haven't needed to recharge yet. And she has listened for close to 2 days. I would say 35+ hours. The best part for me is she can still hear me with them in. For her it is tha5 they stay on, but dont hurt her ears. For the amount spent very worth it to have for a kid.

author: David
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsBest value open air ear buds
body: Most comfortable open ear Bluetooth device. Use the soundcore app to fully enjoy these ear buds.

author: Ricky Frazier
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsSoundcore earbuds
body: I have bigger ears. So they don't really lay over my ear hole. But sound good. Good quality. Like them anyways.

author: Bobbi Ofstein
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood deal
body: I like how lite they are. These are the first earphones that actually stay in my ear and doesn't hurt!

author: Carrie Koenig
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsOn-ear headphones
body: Not comfortable; on ear

author: Dan schroeder
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGood quality
body: Little bigger than expected

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsComfort & good acoustics
body: The sound is very good & the earbuds are comfort

author: Georgia Moseby
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsI Love it
body: Very clear sound and it fits my ear perfect. The only issue is the range of the bluetooth when I'm away from my phone, it cuts out or drop connection when your 15 to 20 feet away from your phone.

author: Randy Early
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsSurprisingly better than expected
body: Headphones are better than expected. App interface is user friendly and includes customizable calming soundscapes. Battery life is long. Only complaint is that headphones do not power off unless placed back in the case.

author: Mauricio Quinze
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe best cost benefit
body: I was positely surpriesed by the call quality and functionality of the item. I have been using Samsung buds for quite a while and it was a much cheaper quality and experience improvement from that.

author: Doug McVay
title: 2.0 out of 5 starsOutside noise
body: Open ear design lets in too much outside noise for my liking.

author: Michael Zapf
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWould recommend
body: The fit is great, sound quality is on par with sets costing 3-4 times more. Charging cradle is very nice, keeps everything in a small package.

author: Aaron T.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Comfortable Buds
body: Great comfortable headphones. I was skeptical about over the ear open ear buds at first because I thought there would be loss of sound but they are great.

author: Burns 🔥
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThe sound is not completely forced into your head
body: The sound is good and they stay on your ears, I never likedc5he ones of any kind pushed into my ear it causes ear wax build up where you have to go to a doctor to remove the wax. So for me these are perfect

author: Jose P.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSmall and comfortable
body: This is a great and comfy item, I have small ear canal and it works great for me.

author: KEWl
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound and price! Open air is comfortable
body: Great price and sound! Very pleased with their performance 👍🏾 Nice feature too!

author: Patricia Mahoney
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsNot for small ear lobes.
body: I returned these only because of the fit. The part the wraps around the ear was too thick for me. If you have small ear lobes, and wear glasses, these may not be the best fit.

author: Quinchella
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsAs described
body: 5 Stars! Loud and clear sound and stays on ears perfectly 😁!

author: topinate
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood Sounding
body: Good sound for the price.

author: Antione
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat deal
body: My dad loves them! Bang for your buck. The app unlocks more features to the headphones

author: G. Williams
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsMissing charging post
body: I do not know. Got them and could not charge them. One side the charging post was not there. So I had to send them back.

author: TJ
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsGreat, but charging case does not show battery level.
body: Overall, I love these earbuds! They hook on my ear really nice and don't fall off during workouts. The only negative thing I have to say is that the charging case does not show battery percentage.

author: Fernanda D.
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent quality
body: Excellent quality, amazing.

author: candi behro
title: 3.0 out of 5 starsThey hold a charge well but they’re not great in loud places
body: My husband was really excited to get these headphones, but he cannot wear them when he’s mowing the lawn or anything like that because the outside noise is too loud and the  headphones just do not put out enough noise

author: S. McCoy
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsSo comfy
body: Love these. So comfortable I forget I have these on.

author: Amazon Customer
title: 1.0 out of 5 starsPoor connection issues.
body: While these headphone are really nice and comfortable, I have had many issues with connectivity and pairing. During workouts I have had them lose connection randomly. Now about a month and a half after I purchased these they will not connect to my iPhone even after unpairing and forgetting the device.

author: Laurie Weiss, author
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsThey don’t fall off
body: These are comfortable, easy to use, stay, put, have a great sound that doesn’t leak out to other people, and allow me to hear what’s going on around me.

author: Wendy
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGood headset
body: I really wasn't sure what to expect from this headset.  They got good reviews but it still can be a toss=up.  I am pleasantly surprised.  They are comfortable and according to my husband, they are the best headset that I've owned.  He says the clarity on the other end is excellent.  He doesn't get a lot of background noise while on calls with me, it is just crisp & clear.  It was a very good Prime Day purchase.

author: Elizabeth Milne
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat Budget Friendly Headphones
body: Easy to use with great sound!

author: Amazon Customer
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsClear.
body: Clear and precise sound.  Comfortable fitting.

author: Michael L. Lewis
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsComfortable and stay in place
body: These are very comfortable and have great battery life. I’ve owned two pairs of these, I lost the first pair on vacation. The open ear buds go around my ears nicely and stay in place when working out or running, I tend to wear them for hours while I work and I really enjoy them. The battery life has been great as well. The reason for 4 stars is that they aren’t great if I get a phone call because the mic doesn’t seem to work well and people have trouble hearing me. Also the bass is almost non existent, but they are still pleasant for music. They are also a good choice for listening to podcasts and audiobooks where bass isn’t a priority, and they are neutral and clear for that purpose. Overall these are very nice for the price and I find they stay in place and are more comfortable than most ear buds.

author: Rabr
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsExcellent earphones. Charging box could be better.
body: Very impressed! These light weight on the ear “earphones” are excellent. They fit good, lightweight and have an excellent sound quality. I was especially impressed with the app that let you adjust tone quality and bass. I ended up liking the preset tone the best but it is nice to know these can be adjusted if you want too. My only complaint is the charging box. It does not have a decent charge indicator. It is just a light. I have another pair, different brand, that has charge % level indicators for the box and for the ear phones. I really like that BUT those phones do not sound near as good as these. I’ll take the sound quality any day! Highly recommend.

author: stacey
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsover-ear buds
body: sounds great.  love the over ear fit!

author: Eddie Beirne
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsDoes it's job
body: Works good. A little small around my ear and feels bulky

author: M Parrish
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsGreat sound and doesn't seal to ear canal!
body: Finally, a pair of ear headphones that don't fit into the ear canal (that type that can cause frequent ear infections) are comfortable and sound good!

author: Lori
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsComfortable to wear
body: I love how comfortable these are to wear. The sound quality is amazing.

author: Not A Robot!
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWell alrighty then!!
body: Hello everyone, these earbuds are light in weight very very comfortable on there just about like there not there. NOTE I walk at my job so running I can't say if they will fall but they never slipped also! Sound quality is awesome, range is 👌, you can adjust the ear so its mostly will fit all ear sizes!!pairing is easy all you do charge them first then remove from the case wait for the lights to blink then simply search in your Bluetooth settings and your ready!!!

author: Amanda R
title: 4.0 out of 5 starsOverall good for the price
body: Nice sound but sometimes the people on the other end can not here me and then I have to repeat my self. Great for music.

author: ignacio Ballerio
title: 5.0 out of 5 starsWorks great!
body: They are perfect for workouts and running!
